comments: This game cured my depression. It relieved anxiety. It brought America together, blessed the world with a revived Freddie Mercury, saved Cape Town from disaster, sent away a pox, and cured the diseased. If you want a miracle, this game will provide.

Because it got deleted i was looking for games like CAB (crafting and building) then i came across this... i downloaded the game but it had no sound and the controls were crappy.... like i mean how on earth do you jump in this game!?!??!  If you rated 3-5 star. CHANGE IT TO 1 STAR!!

Stole an old version of MCPE and put a texture pack. Even got the sounds from Minecraft but the gameplay isn't so bad. I managed to survive a night but the most annoying thing is the ads that keep popping in middle of the gameplay. If there was a way to change the texture pack, I would rate 5 stars.

What are the mobs supposed to be. The zombie pig men don't burn in the day and not like Minecraft. It's way off. And I'm a 12 almost 13 year old and Minecraft looks better than this. Who ever made this should, get this game off the play store.

They basically stole mcpe 0.11.0 (idk) with the plastic texture pack, slapped some other details and put it on the play store XD this is just hilarious, well if you poor and don't have the money to get mcpe full, this app is just for you XD

comments: This  was really  fun! Starts off easy but gets harder, not near the ads of the  other games I have played. Takes extra words, hints are reasonable,  earning money is reasonable.  So far the best of the word connects !! Really happy with this game, will add to my phone  and get rid of the other word connect games that seem to have ad, after ad not to mention the high amount for hints! There is one reason I didn't  give it a 5, because some of the ads get stuck and you can't  exit,  overall  4.8!

I love this game! As others have stated it's very addictive! It's also challenging when you get up in the amount of games you played. My only problem is that when you're asked to watch a video to collect points, the video stops playing and and you don't collect the points. This has happened to me 5 times in a row. Other than that, I do not know what people are talking about as far as a lot of ads. I don't find that at all.

The game isn't bad if you like word puzzles. My dislike comes from the fact that I have push notifications for this app turned off, but it somehow continues to manage to send them. It also keeps poor track of your coins. Good time killer.

Child-friendly! And, as an adult? I love how am yet to see an advertisement. üòä  Unlike other word games like Word Connect, it also lets you find and play words that are not necessarily those found on the board, storing it in an "Extra" slot, which generates added points to your score, rather than telling you to choose the word that's only on the board.  ADDENDUM: After reading the comments, it appears there may be ads after all. Am yet to see any though. Perhaps because am still in a lower level.

Not a bad time killer - quick paced and not too taxing on the brain. I wish it had a more comprehensive dictionary so you would still get bonus points for valid words like 'cad.' No matter - still basically a four star, though almost three for the number of ads.

Game is fun. But giving me pop ups to bring me back to the game while it's not open is a nono. Especially when it takes up half the screen. I'd give 5 stars cause i had fun playong this, but this one thing is annoying. Especially with the amount of ads, it shows you just wanna push people to keep playing for that ad revenue. Won't be downloading any of your games after i delete this now.

descriptionHTML:
Are you tired of the old fashioned word search interfaces?
Do you want to enjoy a totally new experience of word puzzle game?
★★★ Now, you can download Word Cross and play on BOARDS for FREE! ★★★

Word Cross is a creative crossword puzzle game which can inspire your passion for brain challenges. It includes all the essences of word scramble games to make you feel totally ADDICTIVE & ENTERTAINING.

➤ New & Fresh Look: If you like to play board games and puzzle games, you must love the clean and fresh BOARD UI for your first sight.

➤ Handy & Easy to Play: You can easily swipe the letters to form a specific hidden word. It’s easy to play and fun to master for everyone.

➤ Surprising Bonus: Login everyday and get daily bonus, also, you will get coins after finding out the Extra Words which don't present on the crossword board.

➤ Over 2,000 Exciting Challenges: It starts easy and becomes challenging fast. And you can test your limits of the words you know. More levels are on the go.

➤ 100% Addictive Word Game: You’ll never experience a dull moment for it! Play this crossword puzzle once and you won’t be able to put it down!

☆ HOW TO PLAY ☆
- Swipe the letters to line up words to fill up the blanks horizontally and vertically on the board
- Tap the “Shuffle” button to change the order of letters
- Tap "Ask Friends" when you get stuck and get rewards
- Tap the “Hints” button to get clues
- Get more hints with coins by purchasing or watching videos

★ FEATURES ★
• Nice & Clean BOARD for you (Stay tuned for customizable themes)
• More than 2000 Challenges
• FREE to get Daily Bonus
• Find words with bonus to collect more coins
• Simple & Easy to play, hard to beat gameplay
• Totally FREE for all players
• Suitable for both kids and adults to train word search skills
• No network required and you can enjoy word search at any time

DOWNLOAD now to begin training your brain and become a real master of word search puzzles on BOARDS!

★ CONTACT ★
support@boardgame.freshdesk.com

comments: I love this game! If you like chess and like to think you'll like this game no doubt! There are some ads but not so much that it makes me want to turn off my Wi-Fi. It has cute graphics and runs smooth. I just cant get enough. As far as scary no not scary a little like whoa they're gunna hit.. Oh wait phew how did they not hit? RGB keep up the good work with this game and all your other free stuff! You guys make great games for all ages!

I love this puzzle game to death. I can literally play it all day and never get tired. Thank you for the challenging ones, it gets my brain going and it makes the game more tense. I certainly am inlove with the music. Please put a soundtrack on youtube, I would love to listen to it !! Thank you creators of the game, I enjoy playing it so much, and I do hope that there's more.

descriptionHTML:
RGB Express is a unique and beautiful puzzle game. Simple to play, yet super addictive!

You are running RGB Express, the one and only delivery company specialized in delivering colors.


This is how you do it:

🤔 Draw routes for your truck drivers
🎁 Make sure that every house receives the correct package
▶️ Press play
🚚💨 Sit back and watch while RGB Express delivers!


Features:

✓ 400 FREE levels
✓ Easy gameplay suitable for all ages
✓ Lots of challenges for puzzle game fans
✓ Beautiful graphics
✓ Excellent soundtrack and hilarious sound effects

The game starts off with easy puzzles, which will teach you the many tricks, that help you solve the more difficult ones. There are bridges, buttons, sometimes you must swap cargo from one truck to another.. Eventually you will meet the mysterious white car!


★★ Pocket Gamer GOLD AWARD winner! ★★
★★ Already 7 million players! Thank you all! ★★


Available In-App purchases:

PREMIUM 💎 KING TRUCK 👑
★ The premium version of RGB Express
★ Removes ads
★ Supports game development and future updates

HINTS 🤯
★ The game contains 3 free hints that will help you if you get stuck. If you want to use more hints, you can buy them as in-app purchases.


Please note:
★ Watching bonus videos after completing levels is optional. Press the arrow button to proceed to next level if you don't wish to watch a video
★ TIP: Sign-in to Google Play Games at the main menu to unlock achievements! If you change your phone or tablet, you can then restore your game progress by signing in to Google Play Games before completing any levels. Please note that this only restores the progress based on the achievements (100% completed islands).
recentChanges: - A new challenge: Mirror mode! Another perspective to solve the puzzles  [Complete 100 levels to unlock mirror mode]
- Expert Mode par values are now tougher on some levels!  [Complete 200 levels to unlock Expert Mode]
- Improved tutorials to help new players
summary: Easy to learn puzzle game with a serious challenge for puzzle game fans!
title: RGB Express

comments: Good game to pass your time. Upgrade costs and parts spawn rates are reasonable if you only use a few vehicles because it will take a long to yo max out everything. I think it will be better if league vs trophies distribution are reworked because its very easy yo reach legends. should give a higher win bonus at higher trophies i think to make it more competitive. And lastly, hackers should be deleted from leaderbord.. there are a few impossible timings on the board.

I enjoy the game greatly. It's slightly different with  the chest and stuff but it is sure nice to get bonuses every now and than. There are new adds though which I'm not super stoked about like the brake time adds but they keep them short and can be skipped quick if you have already watched them. All and all great game

I love this game. Every game I've had, I played for a week or so, and uninstalled. But this one? Ive had for almost 6 months. Been playing every single day. Finally reached legendary 32, I've unlocked everything. I love the VIP subscription and upgrades it gives you. I would like atleast one new vehicle option every month or so. Or at least a new adventure spot. Making a modded version of the rally car would be fantastic. Also, an upgrade on the formula car where it doesn't almost dead stop after it lands from a big air.

If you don't want to give away free stuff from the chests, don't. But stop wasting my damn giving me these "free" coins for watching a video only to have the ad freeze %95 of the time. The are plenty of other free games out there, might be time for a change.
Constant ads.  Excruciatingly slow progression unless you pay.  Game crashes more than I crash in the game.  Could have been a great sequel to HCR 1, but it feels like playing a money-grab instead.

Superb game! Too bad, the elements of hate like to hack good things and cause frustrations. For this reason, constantly run constant updates. I wouldn't mind paying through my rather expensive data to diffuse the damage by these bored, small prick nincompoops! Africaüòùüòùüòù

comments: There is just to much to say about this brilliant, creative, and fun game! It keeps me busy while im bored and on a road trip! I saw an ad for this on instagram and decided to download it, and let me tell you I was not disappointed with the outcome. I've been seraching for games like this and I have finally come across such a fantastic game! The Fluffy charectors should be sold as toys because of their adorable look!

I have just one piece of criticism... How is it that you're not selling these things as toys??? I want, like, all of them. For the love of God, make a Kickstarter if you must, but you need to make real Fluffies and sell them right now! The game's great, by the way, although I wish the Fluffy didn't cover the view so much, and I also wish the rainbow system thing was better explained, because I have no idea how it works. Keep it up!

I love Fluffy Fall so much!! It is SUPER kawaii, fun, fuzzy, and enjoyable. It takes up your time as you try to beat your highscore!! Mine is 45.  I am really hoping that it updates, because I want all the monthly gem stones to be in stone section. I think it would be cool to have my gem stone. And play as it.  Anyways, I really love the game, it is so amazing!! If you love kawaii and fun games, get Fluffy Fall!!! üòäüíï

Absolutely Love this! I've only been playing for at least an hour but it's so unbelievably adorable! I always try sticking with adventure games but any game with cute little puffblocks are always gonna be tested as well, I definitely recommend people of all ages to play üòÅ

It's adorable, plays well, wonderful to waste a few hours on. HOWEVER,  The special effects each cube is supposed to do doesn't. The Dice is supposed to change to random fluffies, and literally all of them are supposed to put more gold in the tubes. Neither of those things happen?

I love this, the achievements and different types of characters are great, the only the that sucked for me was the music. I wish there was at least more variety because the song that plays throughout the menu and game isn't that good + it gets old.

descriptionHTML:
Dash headlong into an astonishingly fun (and incredibly cute) 3D endless-run adventure! Take on level after level as you fly your cuddly Fluffy through danger with just a finger. Dodge a blaze, snake around ice, go rolling past lasers and escape other crazy hazards that block your way.

The road is full of pitfalls, but it’s sure to pull you in.

Features:
• Amazing 3D animation meets accessible gameplay that’s popular with kids, but still has enough fast arcade action to give anyone a rush.
• Dodge screen-blurring ice blocks, escape flames and blaze past loads of other dangers that can harm your adorable Fluffy.
• Collect Gold to unlock more than 60 cool Fluffies and find the cute little puff that suits you the best.

The perfect game for rolling out to kids (yet still super addicting to adults) who enjoy the popular endless-run gameplay style and fast action!

descriptionHTML:
** Over 5 Million Downloads! **

Philippine Slam! brings the fun of 2v2, full-court basketball to your mobile devices. This zany and quirky arcade-style basketball features ridiculous antics, high-flying dunks, and witty commentary that will keep you at the end of your seats. It’s basketball striped down to its most fun and basic components which makes it easy to pick-up and enjoy.

Based from the players and teams of the Philippine Basketball Association, you can choose from real teams and players with real stats and abilities. Play against different AI difficulties, beat different campaigns, and even play with a custom player using your own picture as a face!

FACTS
The Philippine Basketball Association is the first professional basketball league in Asia and is the second oldest continuously existing in the world after the NBA.

Philippines men's national team popularly known as Gilas Pilipinas is consist mostly of Philippine Basketball Associaton players and the Philippines was awarded the Most Valuable Fan (MVF) Best Country Award during the recent 2014 FIBA World Cup.

FEATURES
* 2 vs 2 full court hoops game
* Create your own player and join your favorite team!
* Funny Taglish (Tagalog/English) game commentator
* Compete for the All Filipino, Governors Cup and Commisioners Cup Championship!
* Collect Trophies on ALL TEAMS!
* Action packed and exaggerated gameplay.
* Jam the hoops with amazing slam dunks!
* Get ELECTRIFIED and do high flying dunks!
* No Fouls
* Play as one of the current Philippine Basketball Association teams.

** Barangay Ginebra
** Alaska Aces
** Magnolia Hotshots
** San Miguel Beermen
** Tropang TNT
** Rain or Shine Elasto Painters
** Meralco Bolts
** NLEX Road Warriors
** Phoenix Fuel Masters
** Global Port Batang Pier
** KIA Picanto
** Blackwater Elite

Guest Teams:

* Gilas Pilipinas
* 2017 All Star Luzon
* 2017 All Star Visayas
* 2017 All Star Mindanao

PERMISSIONS
* READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: permissions for selecting photos when creating a player
* WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: permissions for saving edited photos for custom player
* CAMERA: permissions for taking photos
* READ_PHONE_STATE: permissions for user statistics

We will continue to work and update the game with new rosters and more awesome features.

Like our facebook page to get updates and join contest
fb.com/pbaslamgame

And visit our websites at:
www.philippineslam.com
www.ranidagames.com

For comments and suggestions you can email us at
info[at]ranidagames.com
developerAddress: Macahora Building, Pacita Ave. San Pedro Laguna 4023 Philippines.
summary: The best free basketball game for your mobile devices!
title: Philippine Slam! 2018 - Basketball Slam!

descriptionHTML:
Bidding on storage auctions is a very good way to make money, if you’re not afraid to test your luck and instincts, that is. Go full high-stakes, outbid your rivals and turn a profit by selling your valuable acquisitions in your own pawn shop. You’ll be rich and powerful in no time!

HIGHLIGHTS

💸PROFIT from your smart deals and unlock new buildings in town to expand your business and make even more money!

💸OUTBID your competition in edge-of-your-seat storage auctions. Enjoy intense gameplay as you choose, analyze and bid faster than your rivals in auctions all over the world!

💸RUN your own pawn shop and display your rare and valuable acquisitions. Make customers come from all over the world to spend money on your business and make you rich!

💸LIVE through a gripping story with engaging characters on your quest to turn your rundown family business into a city-wide business empire!

💸GET KNOWN in the auction world and be noticed by big names on the scene: you never know who might want to do business with you!

💸COLLECT a wide range of exotic items, from rare antiques you can restore to cars and boats you can renovate and sell at an epic profit!

Take part in every auction and don’t miss a single opportunity to bid: some of these musty old garages hide treasures beyond your wildest dreams! Try your luck, but never ignore your instincts: they can make or break a bidder’s career!

Become a rising star as you take part in bigger auctions and deal with the good and bad attention you’ll get: some big pawn shop moguls might not like the competition your business represents, and they’ll pull out all the stops to hinder your path! Such problems come with the territory when you get rich and notorious, so be prepared to deal with it!

Start your pawn empire now and get ready to bid!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

comments: Someone needs to be fired or at least schooled on currency exchange rates. They offer 2 packs for 5 and 20 then except for rare sales which offer 49 and 79 dollar packs everything is 100 dollars google should step in and pull this game off the google play market for a square enix licensed product they have enough backing to have actual microtransactions not be a game exclusive to rich people who use 100 dollar bills as toilet paper...

When it's not crashing, it's fun to play.  Sucks when it doesn't load of locks up during game play.  Also it gets expensive as you have to buy packs at $99 a pop after the 1st 2.  The game play is addicting, but no fun if you cannot afford the special offers they continue to throw in your face every time you log in.  I love final fantasy games but this particular one is a money pit!.  Not to mention the constant crashing

Please understand that there is really nothing free about this game except the install. While the gameplay WAS very promising at first, purchaseable bonus packs take any strategy completely out of the game. Now, in addition, each new element of the game that has been released in recent weeks requires cash to unlock. I can only use about half of the games features now. Bummer. If you're willing to pay, have a blast with this game. Otherwise leave it alone!

I started this game when it first came out. There were hardly any game advantages and everyone was having fun and on the same playing field. As more and more packages got released into the game it became a pay to win situation. I personally do not think spending $100+ on a phone game is a wise investment. Thus I enjoyed the game by taking advantage of their events and the prizes within the game. However, it has become dominated by people who payed to be the big guy and the little people get absolutely demolished. It has taken the fun out of playing, which really dissapoints me as it was a fun game to play.

This game has potential to be fun but it's completely ruined because IT'S COMPLETELY PAY-TO-WIN which sucked the fun out of the game that I quit. Don't get me wrong, Final Fantasy is highly respected RPG franchise because it's full of great games in the series. But no this one.  However, I might come back if the game developers make it not as pay-to-win as it is now. Right now, it's a complete money bucket!

This game is great and fun, I love spending my time playing this game. One problem though, what is going on with the packages? Why is it every time a package is bought all the packages go from 20 to 100 dollars ? We should be able to buy the 20 dollar packages more than once! Is that fixable? Please cuz i do want to keep playing but 100 dollars is too much.
description: Alexis Ren is waiting for you! Join the adventure! Be the hero of your own Final Fantasy XV adventure in the brand new mobile strategy game Final Fantasy XV: A New Empire! Build your own kingdom, discover powerful magic, and dominate the realm alongside all of your friends! Final Fantasy XV: A New Empire is a mobile adventure that lets you rewrite a favorite classic to fulfill your unique destiny. descriptionHTML:
Alexis Ren is waiting for you! Join the adventure! Be the hero of your own Final Fantasy XV adventure in the brand new mobile strategy game Final Fantasy XV: A New Empire! Build your own kingdom, discover powerful magic, and dominate the realm alongside all of your friends!

Final Fantasy XV: A New Empire is a mobile adventure that lets you rewrite a favorite classic to fulfill your unique destiny. Journey through vast kingdoms, gather magical resources, and build the strongest Empire in Final Fantasy history! Fight fire with magic to defend friends and defeat foes alongside millions of players from around the world! Do you have the strength and strategy to control the Crystal and rule the Realm?

✔ Experience your very own epic FFXV adventure on your mobile phone
✔ Jump into the action with Noctis, Cindy, and all of your favorite FF15 characters
✔ Fight alongside friends and against foes in legendary battles against millions of players from around the world!
✔ Build up your large army and best strategy to win in real-time action-packed battles
✔ Create the ultimate Guild or join up with already-powerful forces
✔ Strategize with your guild to crush enemies and beasts in real-time battles
✔ Compete for the Crystal against players from all over the world
✔ Travel the Realms and collect rare resources to build an epic Empire
✔ Become a legend by taking control of the Crystal and ruling the Realm

An epic world with no rules: only magic. Will your magic grow to stand the test of time or will your empire be defeated?

Embark on your own Final Fantasy XV mobile adventure alongside Alexis Ren. Your legend starts now in the new MMORPG: Final Fantasy 15: A New Empire.

Play with Noctis, Cindy, Lunafreya, and many more of your favorite characters in the largest open-world MMO in the series. Explore the endless world of Eos, hunt for treasure, defeat monsters, and join Guilds to meet reliable comrades. Experience Final Fantasy like never before ‚Äì LOG IN NOW to see the LATEST UPDATES!
summary: Build. Defend. Rule. Join Alexis Ren in Final Fantasy XV: A New Empire!
title: Final Fantasy XV: A New Empire

comments: I used to play this game a long time ago with my brother. I thought since after all these years so many new updates have come, the game must feel different. But it's the same. I love the tune that plays as you play it. It's so nostalgic. My brother isn't anymore with me but playing this game makes me really very happy. It's just like I am back in those old days. Specially for me, as it has so many memories, this game is the absolute best.

I have a problem with my account. My punk zombird was maxed out. Level 3. Then when I opened the game, my punk zombird was gone... I obtained that by waiting patiently and gathering 90 diamonds. I had to watch 3 15-30 sec long video for 2 diamonds each. After watching the 3 vids, I had to wait another 8 hours for it to be available again. It took me a month to obtain that bird and then all of a sudden it dissapears?! I obtained it again but I had to start all over again. I uninstalled this app because of that issue.

The game is really addictive. but repeated zombie birds are generated and diamonds are getting wasted. Please change that. One bird one time please. One bird should be at max 3 level not another set. It's wasting my internet to watch video to get diamonds for collecting birds

I personally loved this game. First off,  u cant jump for high periods of time cause u to run into the bombs. Secondly, whats sup with these prices? Thats ridiculous. You cant level up with prices that high and u have to buy üíé gems and coins just to get a level up... But tum... Very great game overall.

I love this game cause it kills our time when were bored. Yep, we, my mom also is addicted to this game hahaha, shes always getting my phone and play this game whenever im sleeping. Love it, I recommend this game to everyoneüíñ you'll be definitely love this game. MobiGame you slaaaay hahaha

I was confident to delete the app from my phone cos it says that the game will be saved on my fb acc. But only the highest score remained and the potion got back to 1. I was already at 56! Deym! Ayusin nyo buhay nyo! Sayang effort ko! Aba!

descriptionHTML:
Race, train and breed your way into becoming the number one horse racing manager! Rise through the ranks by winning derbies and cups to obtain the Ultimate Championship.

Compete in contests against other jockeys online everyday with new and exciting events constantly galloping in.

FEATURES

RACE:
• Ride your way to the top by competing in the local derby or circuit to win earnings and make your way toward the Ultimate Championship.
• Races can be viewed in the intense and suspenseful manner just like a real-life derby or through quick results to get back to business.
• Stunning 3D graphics and realistic photo finishes make Horse Racing Manager 2018 the best virtual horse racing simulation experience around!
• Move through a realistic and immersive calendar of races.


TRAIN:
• Set regiments to prepare your horse for major upcoming matches.
• Boost horse performance stats with food, rest and physical training.
• Maintain and upgrade stats through a variety of training methods or breed horses to create the strongest and fiercest of bloodlines.
• Exercise routines can vary in surface conditions, exertion levels and more.
• Only the best of the best racing horse owners know how to keep their horses in peak form, well rested and at an optimal weight.
• Need your horse to pack on a few pounds? Try treating it to a handful of sugar cubes!
• Unlock additional stable slots to bolster an even more impressive roster of horse racing stars.

CUSTOMIZE:
• Choose a unique look for your jockey and horse with an assortment options.
• Adjust the outfits, emblem and colors that suit your own personal taste.
• Bond with every horse in your stable by giving them individual names.
• Customize a nurturing environment for your horses to flourish!

BREED:
• Buy, sell and breed horses to participate competitions and create a powerhouse stable full of speedy candidates.
• Match two horses with favorable traits to inherit special attributes and stats.
• Rare breeds can be unlocked with special genetic traits such as zebra stripes or super speed.
• Be sure to breed carefully because unique skills can only be obtained through breeding and not trained.
• Participate in a slew of events that can affect special Breeding Rights.
• Stunning 3D visuals showcase an impressive variety of unique colors, patterns, and traits acquired through breeding.

Stop just watching the horse races and take part in the action. Saddle up cowboys, because the number one horse racing management sim is here! Can you be a world-class horse racing manager talked about from Kentucky to Epsom!? Become a horse racing legend now!

* PLEASE NOTE! Horse Racing Manager 2018 is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money.
Meet other players and find out more about Horse Racing Manager:
* Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/horseracingmanager2018
* Twitter: @HRM_2018 (http://twitter.com/HRM_2018)
* Privacy Policy: http://bit.ly/ThirdTimePRIVACY
* Terms of Service: http://bit.ly/ThirdTimeTOS

comments: I love the game, the crafting system is awesome, the gameplay is great. However, there are some points that I suggest  1. Nerf the Damned, also the Lepers, they are strong for beginners. Club or Cart Thills can't beat them easily 2. Make another way to find leek seeds 3. Lepers can detect you sneaking to them, and they spawn out of nowhere. I don't know if it is a bug to me or not. 4. Cooking meat uses too much wood.  I look forward for more updates. It's a great game to be honest.  Edit: I love the events, especially the cart one.

Honestly it's a great game and lots of fun but that energy mechanic needs to change. I know you can walk but it's still such a strange thing to gate your players out of playing.  Maybe if you could always travel at the same speed but if you didn't spend energy you could be attacked randomly while you travel. Or if energy was used to speed up crafting. I dunno but it's the only thing holding me back from a perfect score.

This game is awesome but here are the things like really want in the next game. 1. I need to disconnect with Google play to delete my old saved progress full of mistakes. Please add this feature. 2. Zombies are too hard to beat . Please decrease some of their capabilities. 3. There must be an increase in chest slots . 4. Please decrease the quantity of wood logs to cook. Otherwise all of our hardworking to gather logs while be replaced by only a few meats and others. 6. Please add another source of getting seeds. They are too hard to get.

Very good idea but lack of some stuff like improvements. Right now the demolition system not work and we cannot move the walls or floors. The energy should be more sustainable and will be good if the trees on the base and some stuff randomly spawn. I will drop the game for now and on the future i Will give another shoot

The game is ok.. i love the idea.. but in all RPG and similar games you can accuire your items from when you died from your body in that zone.. also its good when you enter the inventory to pause the game.. when entering a zone the game should give some time before reseting the material and monsters if the player re-enters the same zone.. These are the most critical points so far i have encountered.. please take these in consideration.. thank you

It does look good but I get the feeling it's a "stolen" idea of the game Last Day on Earth because it's almost the exact same thing with a few minor differences. But I'm ok with that. I have both games and play them both. But this game has very sketchy game play, even with the graphics on low on my device, it's all fidgity while collecting in the resource areas. This game, though I think has better overall visuals that LDON, it still has a ways to go to get to a better game play as LEON. Keep up the good work!
description: Grim Soul is a free-to-play dark fantasy survival MMORPG. A once-prosperous Imperial province, the Plaguelands are now covered in fear and darkness. Its inhabitants have turned into endlessly wandering souls. Your goal is to survive as long as you can in this dangerous land. Collect resources, build a fortress, defend yourself from enemies, and survive combat with zombie-knights and other monsters in this new Souls-like game!‚óè EXPLORE NEW LANDSExplore lands afflicted by the Grey Decay. Discover mysterious Places of Power. Try infiltrating ancient dungeons and other survivors‚Äô castles to obtain the most valuable resources.‚óè LEARN CRAFTINGBuild workbenches and craft new resources. Discover new designs and create realistic medieval weapons and armor to battle with the Plaguelands‚Äô most dangerous inhabitants.‚óè IMPROVE YOUR CASTLEBuild a sound foundation for defenses against the undead and other survivors. Defend your citadel, construct and place traps for uninvited guests. But don‚Äôt forget to explore your enemies‚Äô territory to collect valuable loot.‚óè DEFEAT ENEMIESMorning star? Halberd? Maybe an arbalet? Choose from an arsenal of deadly weapons. Deal critical hits and evade enemy attacks. Use different fighting styles. Find an effective strategy for wielding every type of weapon!‚óè SADDLE YOUR HORSEBuild a stable and don‚Äôt miss your chance to gallop into battle against hordes of undead on your war horse or ride through a grim medieval landscape. You can build a boat, a cart, and even a carriage - if you can obtain the necessary parts.‚óè OVERCOME HARDSHIPLife in the Plaguelands is solitary, poor, nasty, brutish and short. Hunger and thirst will kill you faster than cold steel in this sinister medieval MMORPG. Conquer nature, hunt dangerous animals, prepare their meat over an open fire, or kill other survivors to replenish your reserves.‚óè BEFRIEND THE RAVENSBuild a raven cage and these smart birds will be your messengers. Watch the skies. Ravens always circle over something of interest. And that which ravens take interest in will always be of interest for a lonely Exile.‚óè JOIN A CLANA clan will increase your chances of surviving one more day in this cruel and bitter medieval world. Call your brothers in arms to cut down damned knights and bloodthirsty witches.‚óè PREPARE FOR THE NIGHTWhen night descends, darkness floods the world, and you‚Äôll need light to escape the terrifying Night Guest.‚óè RECEIVE REWARDSYou may feel alone, but you are not. There‚Äôs always something to do. Complete quests that bring ravens and receive rewards. Take every chance - that‚Äôs the best strategy for survival in the grim reality of this forgotten kingdom.‚óè SOLVE THE MYSTERYSearch for letters and scrolls to learn about the Empire‚Äôs ancient history. Find keys to solving the mystery of your past and the truth behind this unfolding catastrophe.Life in the Plaguelands is a constant battle not only with hunger and thirst but with hordes of undead and cursed beasts. Conquer nature and fight in this action RPG for real heroes. Become a legend! Storm enemy castles, collect loot, and rule the Plaguelands from an iron throne!Grim Soul is a free-to-play MMORPG, but it contains in-game items that can be purchased. You must be at least 13 years of age to download this game and begin your adventures in Grim Soul. Your strategy for survival will determine everything. Begin your journey and become a hero in a brutal game for fearless warriors.
descriptionHTML:
Grim Soul is a free-to-play dark fantasy survival MMORPG. A once-prosperous Imperial province, the Plaguelands are now covered in fear and darkness. Its inhabitants have turned into endlessly wandering souls. Your goal is to survive as long as you can in this dangerous land. Collect resources, build a fortress, defend yourself from enemies, and survive combat with zombie-knights and other monsters in this new Souls-like game!

● EXPLORE NEW LANDS

Explore lands afflicted by the Grey Decay. Discover mysterious Places of Power. Try infiltrating ancient dungeons and other survivors’ castles to obtain the most valuable resources.

● LEARN CRAFTING

Build workbenches and craft new resources. Discover new designs and create realistic medieval weapons and armor to battle with the Plaguelands’ most dangerous inhabitants.

● IMPROVE YOUR CASTLE

Build a sound foundation for defenses against the undead and other survivors. Defend your citadel, construct and place traps for uninvited guests. But don’t forget to explore your enemies’ territory to collect valuable loot.

● DEFEAT ENEMIES

Morning star? Halberd? Maybe an arbalet? Choose from an arsenal of deadly weapons. Deal critical hits and evade enemy attacks. Use different fighting styles. Find an effective strategy for wielding every type of weapon!

● SADDLE YOUR HORSE

Build a stable and don’t miss your chance to gallop into battle against hordes of undead on your war horse or ride through a grim medieval landscape. You can build a boat, a cart, and even a carriage - if you can obtain the necessary parts.

● OVERCOME HARDSHIP

Life in the Plaguelands is solitary, poor, nasty, brutish and short. Hunger and thirst will kill you faster than cold steel in this sinister medieval MMORPG. Conquer nature, hunt dangerous animals, prepare their meat over an open fire, or kill other survivors to replenish your reserves.

● BEFRIEND THE RAVENS

Build a raven cage and these smart birds will be your messengers. Watch the skies. Ravens always circle over something of interest. And that which ravens take interest in will always be of interest for a lonely Exile.

● JOIN A CLAN

A clan will increase your chances of surviving one more day in this cruel and bitter medieval world. Call your brothers in arms to cut down damned knights and bloodthirsty witches.

● PREPARE FOR THE NIGHT

When night descends, darkness floods the world, and you’ll need light to escape the terrifying Night Guest.

● RECEIVE REWARDS

You may feel alone, but you are not. There’s always something to do. Complete quests that bring ravens and receive rewards. Take every chance - that’s the best strategy for survival in the grim reality of this forgotten kingdom.

● SOLVE THE MYSTERY

Search for letters and scrolls to learn about the Empire’s ancient history. Find keys to solving the mystery of your past and the truth behind this unfolding catastrophe.


Life in the Plaguelands is a constant battle not only with hunger and thirst but with hordes of undead and cursed beasts. Conquer nature and fight in this action RPG for real heroes. Become a legend! Storm enemy castles, collect loot, and rule the Plaguelands from an iron throne!

Grim Soul is a free-to-play MMORPG, but it contains in-game items that can be purchased. You must be at least 13 years of age to download this game and begin your adventures in Grim Soul. Your strategy for survival will determine everything. Begin your journey and become a hero in a brutal game for fearless warriors.
recentChanges: ‚Äî Invisible character issue on some devices is fixed
‚Äî Game progress saving system is improved
‚Äî Rare case with empty event chests is fixed
‚Äî An issue with other exiles' corpses disappearance is fixed
‚Äî The Night Guest now comes later and less frequently
summary: Survive as long as you can. Craft your weapons and battle against cursed souls.
title: Grim Soul: Dark Fantasy Survival

comments: Do NOT go for high level military research without searching monster hunting, and Do NOT go for T4 if you not going to spent thousands of dollars. Even if you don't mind to wait 200 days, you will not able to afford it (lvl 10 military Def, Atk, Health cost 100m gold each). DO NOT GO FOR HIGH MILITARY AND T4 WITHOUT FULLY UNDERSTANDING THE GAME.

Ive been playing for the better part of a year, and this game started out great for a long while. But IGG not only panders and gives better deals to Chinese people, cheaper packs etc. But literally 99% of all mega guilds and players are Chinese or Vietnamese. If your not asain don't play this game  you'll end up like me playing forever just to quit because of the obvious discrimination IGG holds with its playerbase

Not a good game for new players.  Was fun and  interesting at first but you qucikly realise that you are just food for high level players with no way to reach a defensible level.  High level players basically teleport in, raid everyone and teleport out.  They should lock servers to keep it balanced and give more guidance for new players. This game is  clearly weighted towards the people who have been playing it the longest. Dont waste your time

Kingdom 249 is open before just 50 days back. And one guild have 2B might. Most of the guys have millions of might one of them got 700M might. How's this is possible. Kingdom 277 is opened before 15 days back but one guild K03 got more powerful. Top guys got 120M might in just 15 days. Does IGG employees playing this game. We are lover of this game please don't lose your credibility. This two kingdom which I observed only Chinese players are strong. How overall kingdom only Chinese players got higher might in less time.

This game is fun but be prepared for the mother of all Pay2win games.  These folks at IGG are experts at crafting new and exciting ways at fleecing their customers of every cent they can.  You CANNOT compete if u dont pay and pay often.  Players here ...just regular people... dump hundreds of rl $$$ regularly.  You have been warned.

The game is awesome and there is always something to do  so you're never stuck waiting around for powerups or new lives. Unlike other games it doesn't require microtransactions to get stronger, but they do help you quicker if you're interested in paying. I'm addicted and play every day.

descriptionHTML:

Explore exotic magical lands thrown into chaos by terrifying monsters and powerful enemies. Choose your favorite heroes, make new friends, and charge fearlessly into war! Strike down your foes and build an empire!

comments: Very annoying problem with Google Play account disconnections at task swap. Fix this, and I will be able to actually play the game. Since I use my phone for making real income, I need to swap screens to other activities, and each time do a four step log in process back into the game. I have never seen this problem before in any other game, no reason this game would be different. About the game? Well, I'll tell when this problem is gone üòÖ

This is a great game. I have played it for over 2 years now and it's still my favorite game. Advice to newbies, take your time. Stay in one age and build up your resources before moving on. You can play in multiple worlds, join guilds, make friends and they have great quests to do if you choose to.

It is  great game, for ages 10 and up even 9 is okay. It is cool that we are building a town from scratch, like from the prehistoric time, and building our way up. Not like other game that start you off with big present day buildings. It doesn't cost a lot to do things like building and removing things, some object are free, they give the right amount of money and you can always win some more diamonds. In other games you would have to pay to remove object and buildings are ridiculously expensive.  It is hard to make money in other games and to make diamonds. I personally at night put my hunters too make things that take 8 hours and in the day things that take 5 to 15 minutes but sometimes 1hour. It is a very good game, it is almost as a real life city town, empire.

Boring!! Hurry up and wait. Never enough coins and forge points. Constantly waiting for buildings to make money and points. Ready made buildings. Can't build your own. Waiting, waiting, waiting. Been playing about 2 hours and already bored to death!

Started playing, made some progress, then the next time I went to play it wouldn't link back to my Google account and kept saying incorrect password. You get one star because that was frustrating and I couldn't get back to the game I already made progress on. UNINSTALLED...

Fist of all guys I want to thank you for your great job at making this game better  Second when I have my gondola market of any other building with water...I can't conect it to the main ocean outside the map....which basically doesn't make any sense to have a huge sea ship at the center of the city üòÇ  So could you please make it possible to connect gondola market(and not only thing that has water in it) to the main ocean outside the map   Thank you for your attention :)   ‚ù§ you guys )
description: Come and play Forge of Empires! Take control over a city and become the leader of an aspiring kingdom. Guide it through the ages, research new technologies, expand your empire and live through an epic story. Battle other players and prove your skills as king and warlord.FEATURES- Build your city and evolve from the Stone Age to modern times (and beyond).- Develop new technologies and discover new buildings and goods- Produce supplies to manufacture goods- Exchange your goods and trade with your neighbors- Discover new territories and seize control of the provinces and their rewards- Use your negotiation or battle skills to take over sector by sectorForge of Empires is based on our successful browser strategy game which was published by InnoGames, developers of fantasy strategy game Elvenar, in the summer of 2012. descriptionHTML:
Come and play Forge of Empires! Take control over a city and become the leader of an aspiring kingdom. Guide it through the ages, research new technologies, expand your empire and live through an epic story. Battle other players and prove your skills as king and warlord.

FEATURES

- Build your city and evolve from the Stone Age to modern times (and beyond).
- Develop new technologies and discover new buildings and goods
- Produce supplies to manufacture goods
- Exchange your goods and trade with your neighbors
- Discover new territories and seize control of the provinces and their rewards
- Use your negotiation or battle skills to take over sector by sector

Forge of Empires is based on our successful browser strategy game which was published by InnoGames, developers of fantasy strategy game Elvenar, in the summer of 2012. Finally, the online strategy game is available for Android as well, providing cross-platform access.

Forge of Empires is free to download and install. However, some game features can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in­app purchases in your device's settings. A network connection is also required.

Imprint: https://legal.innogames.com/portal/us/imprint

description: Magic Tiles for BTS will challenge your reflexes and reaction time while you play piano covers of your favorite BTS songs!- Play your favorite BTS songs!- Challenge your friends and beat their score!- A must-have app for A.R.M.Y and kpop fans!HOW TO PLAY----------------------------------The game is pretty simple and easy to play:- tap the black piano tiles and avoid the white tiles to complete the song.- every time you complete the song, it gets faster!- the longer you resist, the greater your prizes are!FEATURES----------------------------------- Enhanced gameplay with special tiles such as long notes and bonus blocks.- 5 different instruments!- Online leaderboards to compete with other players.- Lots of daily bonuses.- Perfect for A.R.M.Y.DISCLAIMER----------------------------------This is an unofficial fan-made application. It is not affiliated with or endorsed by BTS, their management teams, or their record labels.
descriptionHTML:
Magic Tiles for BTS will challenge your reflexes and reaction time while you play piano covers of your favorite BTS songs!

- Play your favorite BTS songs!
- Challenge your friends and beat their score!
- A must-have app for A.R.M.Y and kpop fans!

HOW TO PLAY
----------------------------------
The game is pretty simple and easy to play:
- tap the black piano tiles and avoid the white tiles to complete the song.
- every time you complete the song, it gets faster!
- the longer you resist, the greater your prizes are!

FEATURES
----------------------------------
- Enhanced gameplay with special tiles such as long notes and bonus blocks.
- 5 different instruments!
- Online leaderboards to compete with other players.
- Lots of daily bonuses.
- Perfect for A.R.M.Y.

DISCLAIMER
----------------------------------
This is an unofficial fan-made application. It is not affiliated with or endorsed by BTS, their management teams, or their record labels.
summary: Play your favorite BTS songs on the piano!
title: Magic Tiles - BTS Edition (K-Pop)

comments: Found Yu-Gi-Oh on Netflix last week and decided to rewatch it. A few episodes in, and my love for the show rekindled, I got eager to play the game myself. I used to play with Yu-Go-Oh cards when I was a kid but it's been about 12 years since then and so all my old cards are in the loft, not that I know anyone IRL anymore who would fancy a game anyway, and not accessible right now... plus I had forgotten most of the rules too. But this app is just what I was looking for: a way to relearn the rules and have a bit of fun. Perfect for whatever skill level you're at with the game!

this truly an amazing game, there's really only a couple of things, why reduce the monster and spell/trap zones to only 3 cards? I wouldn't say it's bad, I just don't see why you'd need to do it.. plus the average deck size of yugioh is between 40 and 50 cards, why limit us to only a max of 30 cards? (not including the 5 for extra  decks) but all in all its a great game! Finally got my six samurai deck!üòÑ also, I think it'd be an awesome idea to put in a way for duelists to redeem the codes on the cards they've purchased IRL. I bet that'd get even more duelists to play! Just a thought thoughüòä

Just sad if only they could fix the  zone to 5 monsters spell and trap cards. Plus the starting with 5 cards and the original deck size and life points to 8000 it would be soo good. Hope you do that and fix it im sure more ppl would  play this if you do

Trash, true fans would never say this game is great. Only 3 monster and spell/trap zones and the person that goes first only starts with 4 cards? Really? Not to mention the terrible camera angles and rigged matches. If you're a competitive player that doesn't like to get bs, don't play this.

My app is not opening. I love this game wish you have have out more different cards in the packs. I would like to see swords of reveling light. A bunch of rare magic and trap cards. You should not be able to use Odion's chain reaction duel sense in the PvP duels.
THE ONLY REASON WHY IM GIVING 1 STAR IS CAUSE YOU DONT WANT TO CHANGE IT TO 5 ZONES LIKE THE ORIGINAL YUGIOH. Everything else is perfect the unlocking of new cards, graphics, pve, pvp, music etc...
description: Battle monsters, other Duelists and collect battle cards in Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links, the fighting card game straight from the TV show!Online multiplayer games meet card battles in the Yu-Gi-Oh! card game. Collect cards to build your battle Deck and fight other Duelists online to see who is the Dueling Master! Enjoy voices from the anime and heighten the Dueling experience![FEATURES]Fighting Card Games- Battle other Duelists and their special battle Decks- Intuitive controls for beginners! Depth to satisfy "Yu-Gi-Oh!" veterans!- Build your Deck to become the most powerful Dueling Master, with monsters like "Dark Magician" and "Blue-Eyes White Dragon"- Strategic gameplay makes you decide which card comes out next!- Duel with your favorite characters from the Yu-Gi-Oh! world and complete Stage missionsOnline Multiplayer Battles- Fight Legendary Duelists from the show like Yugi, Kaiba, Joey, and Mai! - Multiplayer games force you to find your opponents weakness and strategize- PVP battles pit you against players from around the world! Climb through the rankings and take your place as the Duel World King!Card Battle Deck- Collect cards and form the most powerful Deck for battle!- Build your ultimate Deck and aim for the top- Use the cards that you collect in-game to build and edit your trusty Deck to take on opponents!- Shop for cards in the game store!Stay tuned for future card additions![ABOUT "Yu-Gi-Oh!"]"Yu-Gi-Oh!" is a popular manga created by Kazuki Takahashi that was serialized in SHUEISHA Inc.'s "WEEKLY SHONEN JUMP" since 1996. Konami Digital Entertainment Co., Ltd. provides a Trading Card Game (TCG) and console games, based on "Yu-Gi-Oh!" created from the original manga, that are enjoyed around the world.[Supported OS]Android 4.4 and above
descriptionHTML:
Battle monsters, other Duelists and collect battle cards in Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links, the fighting card game straight from the TV show!

Online multiplayer games meet card battles in the Yu-Gi-Oh! card game. Collect cards to build your battle Deck and fight other Duelists online to see who is the Dueling Master! Enjoy voices from the anime and heighten the Dueling experience!


[FEATURES]

Fighting Card Games
- Battle other Duelists and their special battle Decks
- Intuitive controls for beginners! Depth to satisfy "Yu-Gi-Oh!" veterans!
- Build your Deck to become the most powerful Dueling Master, with monsters like "Dark Magician" and "Blue-Eyes White Dragon"
- Strategic gameplay makes you decide which card comes out next!
- Duel with your favorite characters from the Yu-Gi-Oh! world and complete Stage missions

Online Multiplayer Battles
- Fight Legendary Duelists from the show like Yugi, Kaiba, Joey, and Mai!
- Multiplayer games force you to find your opponents weakness and strategize
- PVP battles pit you against players from around the world! Climb through the rankings and take your place as the Duel World King!

Card Battle Deck
- Collect cards and form the most powerful Deck for battle!
- Build your ultimate Deck and aim for the top
- Use the cards that you collect in-game to build and edit your trusty Deck to take on opponents!
- Shop for cards in the game store!
Stay tuned for future card additions!

[ABOUT "Yu-Gi-Oh!"]
"Yu-Gi-Oh!" is a popular manga created by Kazuki Takahashi that was serialized in SHUEISHA Inc.'s "WEEKLY SHONEN JUMP" since 1996. Konami Digital Entertainment Co., Ltd. provides a Trading Card Game (TCG) and console games, based on "Yu-Gi-Oh!" created from the original manga, that are enjoyed around the world.

[Supported OS]
Android 4.4 and above
summary: Card games with epic monsters! Fight other Duelists in online PVP battles!
title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links

comments: Amazing game. Me and my friend spend hours on it. I get to shows him my mods. He has none though we both have completed the levels. The game NEVER AND I REPEAT NEVER gets boring. Definitely better than the angry birds series must download. The only problome is the metal flap things don't work correctly. They just float in midair.Apart from that  Please make a new selection of levels. My life depends on it!!!!

The game and level desgins promote and foster a great degree of creastive thinking. With very unique mechanics and obstacles that actually require thought and consideration when building. It has great art, along with many bonus levels and content. Fun game overall but level experiences do wildly vary sometimes. From simple to extremely  difficult, sometimes you win by mer luck and not strategy. Along with all that I don't know if anyone else experienced this but the levers on lvl6 were buggy and never worked. All in all good game to play.

Great game but el porkado is broken I can barley ever get any crates, they are in levels that are literally impossible to complete, fix now also the king pig system is garbage. I accidentally piled up about 100 of each cake and then spent about an hour dragging my finger hundreds of times. Power ups are too rare. There should just be a feed all button or something, can I please improve the king pig system

FIX THE ROAD TO EL PORKADO I swear this is frustrating to the point of unplayable. No, those levels ARE unplayable. They cannot be done with this platform glitch at all. Also, sometimes in sandbox mode when I click the tick it disappears when it hits the ground. Occasional and not as game breaking or frustrating as the moving platforms not working but still

Generally great, but destroyed by graphics/world modeling glitches that render levels impossible to complete! Generally involving trap doors that aren't in the right place. Frustrating. AND the new cake race won't unlock rewards- 24000 hrs to go apparently so I can't play more levels.

I don't  understand why people complain about ads and call Rovio money hungry. If may be a "free" game but really nothing is completely free. Developers deserve to get paid. It costs to have a game. Free games have ads just like TV. And you don't have to make the in-app purchase. GO buy a game.
description: From the creators of Angry Birds: a game from the PIGS‚Äô point of view! OiNk! Build makeshift contraptions from a huge collection of parts and make it to the goal without blowing your vehicle to pieces!IGN's "Best Mobile Game of 2012" Winner!"Extremely fun and very challenging" -- Kotaku‚ÄúThe best title Rovio has released yet‚Äù - IGN‚Äú4/4 - Must Have‚Äù -- Slide to Play"If you can‚Äôt enjoy watching a pig drive a badly constructed car off a cliff and onto a pile of dynamite, you probably don‚Äôt have a soul." - Yahoo/BGRCreate the ultimate flying/crawling/rolling/spinning/crashing device and pilot the pigs safely to the eggs!The Bad Piggies are after the eggs again -- but as usual, nothing is going according to plan! Can you create the ultimate flying machine and steer them safely to their destination? Those tricky pigs have a few objects they can use, but they need your help to turn these into the perfect transportation!With more than 200 levels, and free updates coming up, you have hours and hours of pig-crashing, exploding, and flying fun! Get three stars to unlock over 40 more levels! HINT: Sometimes you need to play the level several times to achieve all the objectives -- try building a new device or steering in a different way to earn all the stars!Features:‚óè Over 200 levels crammed with flying/driving/crashing fun!‚óè 40+ special levels unlocked by getting three stars!‚óè Free updates!‚óè 9+ sandbox levels to stretch your creativity!‚óè Ultra-special, ultra-secret, ultra-difficult sandbox level to unlock by collecting ten skulls! Oh ‚Äì guess it‚Äôs not a secret anymore...‚óè 42 objects to create the ultimate machine: motors, wings, fans, bottle rockets, umbrellas, balloons, and much more!Mechanic Pig‚óè Need help? This little piggy will build it for you!‚óè Mechanic pig pre-assembles transport for you!‚óè All you have to do is pilot it!‚óè Tweak his design to get all three stars!New Episode: The Road to El PorkadoEmbark on an archaeological adventure in an all new episode full of treacherously icy environments and spooky dark caves. Be sure to equip the trusty lamp to find your way in the darkness ‚Äì or put the new Night Vision Goggles power-up to use!Get ready to see pigs fly!Become a fan of Bad Piggies on Facebook:http://facebook.com/badpiggiesFollow us on Twitter:http://twitter.com/badpiggiesTerms of Use: http://www.rovio.com/eulaPrivacy Policy: http://www.rovio.com/privacyImportant Message for ParentsThis game may include:- Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13.- Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse any web page.- Advertising of Rovio products and also products from select partners.- The option to make in-app purchases. The bill payer should always be consulted beforehand.
descriptionHTML:
From the creators of Angry Birds: a game from the PIGS’ point of view! OiNk! Build makeshift contraptions from a huge collection of parts and make it to the goal without blowing your vehicle to pieces!

IGN's "Best Mobile Game of 2012" Winner!

"Extremely fun and very challenging" -- Kotaku

“The best title Rovio has released yet” - IGN

“4/4 - Must Have” -- Slide to Play

"If you can’t enjoy watching a pig drive a badly constructed car off a cliff and onto a pile of dynamite, you probably don’t have a soul." - Yahoo/BGR

Create the ultimate flying/crawling/rolling/spinning/crashing device and pilot the pigs safely to the eggs!

The Bad Piggies are after the eggs again -- but as usual, nothing is going according to plan! Can you create the ultimate flying machine and steer them safely to their destination? Those tricky pigs have a few objects they can use, but they need your help to turn these into the perfect transportation!

With more than 200 levels, and free updates coming up, you have hours and hours of pig-crashing, exploding, and flying fun! Get three stars to unlock over 40 more levels! HINT: Sometimes you need to play the level several times to achieve all the objectives -- try building a new device or steering in a different way to earn all the stars!

Features:
● Over 200 levels crammed with flying/driving/crashing fun!
● 40+ special levels unlocked by getting three stars!
● Free updates!
● 9+ sandbox levels to stretch your creativity!
● Ultra-special, ultra-secret, ultra-difficult sandbox level to unlock by collecting ten skulls! Oh – guess it’s not a secret anymore...
● 42 objects to create the ultimate machine: motors, wings, fans, bottle rockets, umbrellas, balloons, and much more!

Mechanic Pig
● Need help? This little piggy will build it for you!
● Mechanic pig pre-assembles transport for you!
● All you have to do is pilot it!
● Tweak his design to get all three stars!

New Episode: The Road to El Porkado
Embark on an archaeological adventure in an all new episode full of treacherously icy environments and spooky dark caves. Be sure to equip the trusty lamp to find your way in the darkness – or put the new Night Vision Goggles power-up to use!

Get ready to see pigs fly!

Become a fan of Bad Piggies on Facebook:
http://facebook.com/badpiggies

Follow us on Twitter:
http://twitter.com/badpiggies

Terms of Use: http://www.rovio.com/eula
Privacy Policy: http://www.rovio.com/privacy


Important Message for Parents

This game may include:
- Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13.
- Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse any web page.
- Advertising of Rovio products and also products from select partners.
- The option to make in-app purchases. The bill payer should always be consulted beforehand.
developerAddress:
Rovio Entertainment Corporation
Keilaranta 7,
FI-02150 ESPOO
FINLAND

summary: Get ready to see pigs fly!
title: Bad Piggies

comments: As others have said, the longer you play, the worse it performs and the more space it takes up, and after a while ads start causing the game to crash. However I've managed to get around it by reinstalling every couple of weeks. Other than that it's a good little game.

It's a pretty fun game, better than I thought it would be. There is one problem, you don't really need to buy "Flooz", but if you do. The prices are a little outrageous. Like 5$ for 100 Flooz, seems a little money hungry. And 100 Flooz for 15 days is 29$ is outrageous as well. I've played other games with better things to do besides upgrading and usually 100 "diamonds" of anything would last 30 and would cost 10-15$. Seems like you're trying to rip people off. Besides the money hungry creators, good game to kill time.

The first idle game that caught my attention. At first, i thought that it's just "one of those idle games".. But, the more I play the more i get hooked because of unique game mechanics. I might give this 5 stars in the future.

I think the game would be enjoyable if it did not crash ALL the time. Get to a new level? Crash. Watch a video? Crash. Crash Them All might be a more fitting name for the only game that has ever crashed more than once on this phone.

It has bugs. Like how sometimes skills don't activate right away, and on rare occasions, not at all. The currencies are pretty fair; I don't feel like have to buy anything (sucks for the devs, but it's not like I can buy anything even if I wanted to). Events keep the game fresh, and I always feel like I have something to do at all times, so it does a good job of keeping me occupied for 20-30 minutes at a time.

Incredible game play it for hours and love it soooo much only good things to say other than server connecting but it's no big deal love the game the style the graphics the game play is all awsome I do have some ideas for the game if your interested number one being adding carnivore and herbivore types into the game so you could have dinosaurs and number 2 is world bosses were the entire community can all defeat one boss and 3 to have the ability to friend people not through Facebook. Love the game it's so good thanks for putting so much hard work into it and adding awsome features cheers

descriptionHTML:
"A much-anticipated IDLE RPG masterpiece on Google Play Store!!!”
March your way through the evil lands, crush the gigantic bosses and free the princess in the epic IDLE role-playing game, Crush Them All.
Tap with one finger, collect and upgrade hundreds of heroes, find powerful artifacts and progress in this never-ending journey even while taking a break!

GAME FEATURES:

★ IDLE GAME :
Setup your heroes and let them fight while you’re away. When you return to your phone, they will be stronger and will have collected tons of loot.

★ COLLECT and UPGRADE heroes to crush stronger enemies along your journey

★ EXPLORE 1000+ stages

★ GUILD RAID BATTLES :
Join multiplayer guild boss-battles and lead your guild to supremacy!

★ CRAFT 50+ powerful artifacts to give your heroes more powers


PLEASE NOTE! Crush Them All is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Crush Them All.

A network connection is also required.

description: Have you ever thought of being menacing prehistoric sea monster & rule the ocean? Sea Dragon Simulator is here to give you that experience. Play as treacherous predator of the ocean. You are a giant big beast with insatiable appetite who can hunt & eat everything that comes in his way. Attack boats, ships, and ski jets to feed your monster. This brute can feel & smell the prey near it. Use your charge attack to break the underwater mirror tunnels, grab people & rip them apart. Use your sharp jaws to create havoc before they breakout.Watch out! You have to use your combo power to save yourself from other sea monsters, they will attack you, injure you & kill you. This is real underwater rampage adventure & sea environment experience! Complete your hunt & fulfill your hunger as fast as you can before you get hunted. Show no mercy, Chase your prey, attack and grab it in the sharp jaws to kill instantly. So, Its time to feed your monster!Sea Dragon Simulator Features:‚Ä¢	Realistic underwater sea experience‚Ä¢	3D graphics, ocean & beach environment‚Ä¢	Thrilling hunting experience with sea dragon monster‚Ä¢	Variety of missions with graduating difficulty.‚Ä¢	Smooth & intuitive controls ‚Ä¢	Easy & fun to play
descriptionHTML:
Have you ever thought of being menacing prehistoric sea monster & rule the ocean?

Sea Dragon Simulator is here to give you that experience. Play as treacherous predator of the ocean. You are a giant big beast with insatiable appetite who can hunt & eat everything that comes in his way. Attack boats, ships, and ski jets to feed your monster. This brute can feel & smell the prey near it. Use your charge attack to break the underwater mirror tunnels, grab people & rip them apart. Use your sharp jaws to create havoc before they breakout.

Watch out! You have to use your combo power to save yourself from other sea monsters, they will attack you, injure you & kill you. This is real underwater rampage adventure & sea environment experience! Complete your hunt & fulfill your hunger as fast as you can before you get hunted. Show no mercy, Chase your prey, attack and grab it in the sharp jaws to kill instantly.

So, Its time to feed your monster!

Sea Dragon Simulator Features:
• Realistic underwater sea experience
• 3D graphics, ocean & beach environment
• Thrilling hunting experience with sea dragon monster
• Variety of missions with graduating difficulty.
• Smooth & intuitive controls
• Easy & fun to play
summary: Get ready to feel the rage of Sea Dragon!
title: Sea Dragon Simulator

comments: Love the concept, but it doesn't work at ALL. I downloaded it, and no matter what I do, nor how absolutely silent it is, the chicken is running and jumping and I have zero control over it. Super disappointed--hopefully it's just glitching?? I wanted to try it, but neither sound nor silence give me any control over it üò£

When I jump, he lands and jumps a second time from the sound of the landing or a coin. Have to turn the media on my phone all the way down to fix it.  Add game sound settings or make the music and movements not register for the chicken. Shorten the ads. And maybe change the visuals to be a little less "flappy bird"-like.

People complain about the ads but 2 dollars is all you need to remove them. Cheap and it supports this fun game. If your game audio is interrupting the jumping then plug in some ear buds, it's that easy people!

It's a great game, hilarious concept, only thing I have issues with is that the noises for picking up the coins pick up as sound. Frustrating when you are trying to be careful and it dings and sends the chicken into a mine... Maybe make them doubtless so they don't get picked up by mic.

Good game but enough with the ads. Way too many and way too long. The ads are longer than the game play. Ine ad was over 30 seconds long. You guys obviously do not read these comments or reply to any of them. This could be a great game.

Way too many adds. The adds block the sensitivity, so I cant adjust that, so I have to scream as hard I can for a jump. Then a 30 sec minimum add almost every retry. No thanks. Could be entertaining though

description: Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas - an action game with a unique gameplay. The protagonist is a gangster who was in a state of free fall in a mine filled with various obstacles. Your task is to manage to bypass obstacles in order to prolong the already short life of a real gangster.But do not think that we threw this dangerous guy into the thick of events without the right to survive. At your disposal will be bonuses that will increase the chances of survival, such as winding time, jerk and others. But whatever you do, this gangsta will still die, the only question is how many meters will he live, falling in an infinitely low mine. Use all your strengths, do not let the bandit break into a cake in the first 10 meters.Compete with your friends, whose gangster will fly the longest distance! It all depends on your reaction and your skills.Features of Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas- 3D game from the third person in the style of San Andreas- Real gangsters like in games or Gangster- Unique gameplay based on free fall- High performance on any device- Convenient management of the game- No Weiss City, only Gangster in free flight- Fascinating drop down- Music that complements the gameplay- Realistic graphics- The best game about Basejumping, Wingsuit and skydiving- Dynamic mapThis is a runner based on free fall, and unlike other runners, there is complete freedom of movement.Attention:Use the joystick on the left side of the screen to move around, and also operate the camera on the right side of the screen to look around.
descriptionHTML:
Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas - an action game with a unique gameplay.

The protagonist is a gangster who was in a state of free fall in a mine filled with various obstacles. Your task is to manage to bypass obstacles in order to prolong the already short life of a real gangster.
But do not think that we threw this dangerous guy into the thick of events without the right to survive. At your disposal will be bonuses that will increase the chances of survival, such as winding time, jerk and others. But whatever you do, this gangsta will still die, the only question is how many meters will he live, falling in an infinitely low mine. Use all your strengths, do not let the bandit break into a cake in the first 10 meters.

Compete with your friends, whose gangster will fly the longest distance! It all depends on your reaction and your skills.

Features of Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas

- 3D game from the third person in the style of San Andreas
- Real gangsters like in games or Gangster
- Unique gameplay based on free fall
- High performance on any device
- Convenient management of the game
- No Weiss City, only Gangster in free flight
- Fascinating drop down
- Music that complements the gameplay
- Realistic graphics
- The best game about Basejumping, Wingsuit and skydiving
- Dynamic map

This is a runner based on free fall, and unlike other runners, there is complete freedom of movement.

Attention:
Use the joystick on the left side of the screen to move around, and also operate the camera on the right side of the screen to look around.
summary: The best simulator of falling real Gangster!
title: Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas

comments: Awesome game! It is user friendly even on f2p players. May I just suggest one thing? I think it would be fun if you could get on and off your mount anywhere. Be it on the town or at the battle field. But so that it wont be used as a means of scape, it should have a casting time to ride the mount. Over all it is the best game there is. Love it to the moon and back! =)

This game is awesome actually but the developer keep opening new servers instead of merge the server. So many people choose to stop to play Seal because of this since less people play in most server. So please don't waste your money and time to play it. You cannot transfer your character to other servers. You need to start from begining. This make the overall experience becoming so bad.

Good game overal. But.. Admin.. Can u please explain to me.. How to use old account when i use other phone? Coz its keep make me new character. Cant use the main. I log in using samsung play. Or can i bind with other account? Pls help me. Coz i change use 2 phones.. And the other one always run off battery. Thanks

I love this game, it's so addicting. But I only gave it 4 stars because we have too many servers. I highly suggest to not add many servers and just fix the older ones because the players in older servers are getting fewer. Like, I'm in S105, and it's not been a week but there's already another server? And it's draining players. Please stop adding servers so some servers will have players too.

I was seal(pc) player long time ago, after go to college had to stop to play games on pc(need it for my degree) until i hear that seal on my region is closing, played for 5 years,vacum for roughly 3 years then closing. I just swipe left, right, searching for new game to play, then i found this one, indeed its good, but not even close to the seal pc. That being said, the game itself is ok, it like other game that already around, hack n slash, vip, etc. But i can't feel im playing seal on this game. It feel like playing common game. I can't express it properly, but ... Yeah, uninst, i don't want to ruin my memories bout seal.

I really loved this game. Its content its gameplay indeed it is really my taste. However, i hope that we can transfer into other servers without restarting ones account. As well as the timing system of each events sometimes its not exact. Hope you guys work on it to make this GAME BETTER. Pleaseeeeeeeeee!!!!!!

descriptionHTML:
Celebrate 2018 Lunar New Year with Google Play
Enjoy double diamonds offer and exciting in-game holiday events available on 14 - 22 Feb 2018.

“Seal:New World” – The Rascal Rabbits are back! Classic 3D MMORPG returns!

Your favorite characters in a brand new adventure;
In this new world, you are our only hope!


● After 14 years, Seal Online From Korea is Back!
The classic returns!
Finally play Seal Online in multiplayer mode on your mobile – a whole new story with a brand new experience!


● 3 Classes Are Back: Knights, Priests and Jesters!
An improved world-view with more exciting levels to challenge.
Upgrade your character, choose skills, gear and train pets.
Alliance system, World Boss gameplays, Arena, Survival challenges, Magic Beanstalk, and more for you to explore!

● Hide the Cleavers! Rascal Rabbit is Back!
Train pets and take them with you – over 40 kinds, all cute yet deadly!
Ride your mount into battle; no need to tire your little legs anymore...

● Hundreds of Costumes; Dress to Impress
Wondering what to wear today? Change costumes according to your mood.
Loads of fashion and accessories to choose from. If you can imagine it, we’ve got it!

● Say Goodbye to Singledom – Let’s Get Married!
Tired of being single? Try out the in-game wedding system.
Earn intimacy points and propose to the object of your desire.
Hold a wedding banquet, choose your wedding dress and invite your friends to witness your special occasion!

● Fun Social Interaction
Chat with players in-game using text or voice messages.
The fairest trading system around; perfect for making new friends!
developerAddress: 5118 HOPEWELL CENTRE 183 QUEEN'S ROAD EAST WANCHAI HONG KONG
