descriptionHTML:
Your story begins here!
Wanna enjoy living on campus with amazing friends?
Wanna find love with the mysteriously luring vampire?
The choice is yours!

The wiser your choice is, the more interesting your story gets.
You can never put your phone down as these weekly-added stories make you insatiable!

◆Campus Hacker◆
Alice the partygoer and Faith the unexpected are your roommates.
When Norman the football player decides to move in to your flat, things get a little crazy...

- Norman the football player, Peter the gamer, and Dean the aspiring actor are the candidates. Who can make you fall in love?
- Problems at home can be solved if your choice is correct.
- Your choice of an answer also affect your friendship and their lives. It's something to consider when choosing an option.

◆Untold Darkness◆
Alex St. Cyr is a member of the famous on-campus residence the House St. Cyr.
On the way home after a party, you witness a girl who gets attacked by a man with fiery red eyes.
How does this incident affect your life?
And what are the secrets of the St. Cyr family?

- Sexy and daring boys like Alex and Max make the story more thrilling!
- Solve the mystery of the St. Cyr family.
- Work hand and win the journalist competition!

◆Yearbook◆
Your friend Daisy goes missing when you come to meet a detective who has recently moved in to town.
Carl the detective and his assistant Stanley as well as Troy the classmate want to help you locate Daisy.
Will you succeed in saving Daisy?
Carl's dark past gets revealed as the search makes a progress...

- Solve the mystery of Daisy's missing case.
- Use your impressive memory to help Stanley locate his missing item.
- Disguise and attend a party to catch the pickpocket!

◆Hit the Floor!◆
Worst day ever! You lose job and boyfriend on the same day!
While wandering the city feeling sucky, you run into your ex Ken in front of a bar.
Remembering the good old times, you decide to start all over.

- Work hard to sign the record deal!
- David the producer, Adrian the pianist, and Ken the ex. Who has the ability to shine you on the stage the most?

◆Features◆
- Add stories weekly.
- Offer HQ graphic.
- Divide up into genres.
- Customize the look of a protagonist.
- Change storylines depending on options.
- Choose appearances depending on occasions.
- Bookmark your favorite episode!

Official Website: http://myshelfapp.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MyShelf.NTTSolmare/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/MyShelf_Solmare
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/myshelf_solmare/

◆About Us◆
NTT Solmare is a Japanese company based in Osaka, Japan. We strive to make the best simulation apps for adults. Our sims are free! If you like romance novels, visual novels, or cute guys, then we think that you will love our games!
So download one of our free games today, and find out why our games are so popular!

comments: This game is amazing! It's the standard that other sniper games should try to achieve! The graphics are incredible, the gameplay is amazing, the game is always new (not repetitive like some games). I've never enjoyed a mobile game so much.      There's also different kinds of missions. So one mission you'll be trying to snipe a dealer, and the next you'll be using a pistol to clear rooms! I played the game over and over again.

First off it is a first person shooter game, so violence is a part of the vocabulary; get over it. Game does not bombart w/ adverts. Realistic considering for a mobile device game. The developers did a superb job with its comical graphics, story line, and accuracies with equipment.  It was plain and simple awesome! I would download more games coming from the same source. They're good at what they do.

Very good. Polished noir shooter with fluid controls. It's free and pretty generous so far with the quality of what's on offer. Money seems readily available and upgrades aren't too expensive. The game can be unforgiving at times though, requiring a few retries to get some missions right. Energy in the form of ammo is restored easily by watching an ad or two though.

I rarely leave ratings for games, but this one is an exception. The storyline was intriguing and suspenseful. Each chapter finishes better then the last. Gameplay was great, the pistol controls are a little tricky to operate as the action is fast pace, but the Sniper controls have little to no problems, as you get to take your time. Sound quality is not bad, graphics throw an interesting touch, all while having little to no technical problems. Ads pop up quite frequently (though not as much as other games). However, it can easily be bypassed by turning off your Internet as this game does not require internet to operate. Great game overall. Can't wait for the sequels.

Awesome visuals, even a more awesome story. Not like other sniper games where it's just shoot some random person. The best shooter/sniper game in the play store. Super dope game!! BUT there's one major flaw that's makes the game near unplayable one some of the missions the crosshairs aren't accurate and one point. Specifically the mission when the gravity element is introduced. I know that I am perfectly lined up but I still miss. Please fix this, make it more accurate and it will be a perfect game.

Game creates great atmosphere with ambient sound and music. Controls are responsive but require a learning curve to master, especially the pistol. However, the ads that play inbetween the missions do break the imersion somewhat. Overall, a well polished game that offers a welcome surprise to the shoot-em-up genre in the app store.

comments: Fun game, good time killer, great graphics. Unfortunately,  like with many other games, they sucker you in with rewards at the start only for you to soon hit a paywall. It's  either grind and hope you get lucky or give into the many game ads promoting cash purchases. Anything involving actually online play (co-op, PvP etc) seems to freeze or have crazy lag. Good game, definitely has room for improvement.

It's a good cover-based shooter, with some pretty creative characters and a good pace for quick battles. The unlock system is more than fair, with the ability to save currencies for that one big purchase. I enjoy the ability to play at my own pace without sacrificing my life to the game (cough*Kabam*cough) and I'm having a lot of fun. I've noticed that PVP tends to favor Savage, when he activates Spray and Pray once, half the opposing team dies. Twice, and the round is over. Otherwise a very well done and enjoyable game.

I really enjoy the action this game brings along with good looks and simple controls. Too many times development teams get caught up in the visuals or complex control schemes and forget about what gamers really love and that's not having a complex control panel with nice smooth transition from level to level. Thank you for making this game a joy to play every time I turn it on.

Good concept. Good game. Many glitches. For a game that's touted for and based on pvp it makes no sense that %80 of the time the game freezes going into a pvp battle. It's okay though, you can close it and then immediately reopen it to a message that tells you that you died. Fix your freezing problems and I'd give you 4 stars.

Really solid graphics and game play for mobile. Doesn't want to work with my Bluetooth controller. As a free game they have really doubled down on the shards and multiple currencies to try to get you to spend. You really need to grind if you want to unlock anything without paying.

Good game plagued by hackers who like mimicking Crosses stun constantly.    As well as I would wish the AI would auto pilot itself a bit better when your controlling a hero then having to decide if you want to control a hero at the cost of your other members being brick headed or every One being average.

descriptionHTML:
Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle is very classic, unique, challenging and addictive game. It’s time to install and play famous rock paper scissor classic game in your device. So let’s play the game with your friends or test your luck against the A.I and refresh your memories.

Game is simple and easy to play. Moreover, to make game interesting there are two modes in the game. You can play with artificial intelligence or you can play with your family or friends, game represent a real challenge. In this legendary rock paper scissor game you and the opponent choose a sign of your choice. If you’re a beginner and don’t know the rule of the game, don’t worry here’s a short detail of the rules of the game. First You and your opponent (friend or family) choose a sign of rock, paper and scissor that you will then compare, the rock break the scissors but covered by the paper, the paper beat the stone but cut by the scissors and the scissors beat the paper but are broken by the stone. So make wise ways and challenge the opponent.

Features
• Amazing Hd graphics to make the game more interesting and colorful.
• Play the game Vs. A.I and also against your family and friends.
• Challenging background sound.
• The person with max points will win the game.
• Simple and interesting user interface.
• Invite your family and friends and compete with them.
• Very small size of the app force you to keep it in your device.

So download Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle and start having fun by playing in leisure time.

Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle By BACA BACA Games in casual and family category 2017.

Hey guys! We have come up with a fantastic mermaid's love story. The mermaid lives in a castle deep in the sea. A group of friends came here for fishing. But unfortunately, they capture the innocent mermaid. Mermaid feels so disappointed after what happened to her. She wants to get out of there. But How? Then she remembered her birthday present. The witch has given her a magical ring to get human's legs. But the ring is not on her finger then where is the ring? She found the ring and uses it to have legs like the human and get out of there.

After getting human's legs she went to meet the prince who captured her in the aquarium cage. Prince falls in love with her in short time. Carol and Prince went on a date. Prince proposed to her but she rejects it and reveals that she was just taking revenge. What will happen next in this amazing story of mermaid rescue? To know, play this mermaid rescue game and have lots of fun.

comments: Great Effort but can't give 5 star rating as the game only gives you very little time to check the spelling of many words. While it should have been like 15-20 seconds for checking each of the words spelling & then the next. 10 to 15 words can comprise each level and the words going to be harder as one goes up in the levels. This will be fun for sure. Other wise in current context folks will get disheartened sooner than expected and would cease to play it and that I suppose should be amended ASAP. Thank you.

You need to make up your mind if you are using British English or US English. Seems Americans don't realize the past tense of 'spell' is either 'spelt' or 'spelled' in the US you don't often see it spelled 'spelt' (LOL) although both SPELT AND SPELLED ARE CORRECT. You do this with other words with US & UK spelling differences.  You forget both are correct. It was British English a thousand years before it was American English. Americans have been BUTCHERING English for about 300 years now.

Love the concept of the game but it's pretty difficult to pass all the levels when you know the correct spelling of the word but it is WRONG on the game. This happened multiple times. Uninstalling. If you're gonna make a spelling app, you may want to make sure the words are spelled correctly.
It's great for spelling. There are a lot of misspelled words though. And also, way too many ads.
Hey @Daffy Duck! Maybe its you thats spelling things wrong. Spelt??? Shouldn't that be spelled?? Just saying....
This game is highly amusing and thoroughly addictive but more importantly a positive brain training exercise for individual or family use.  Impossible to become bored.. üëã
description: Test your spelling skills and challenge people from all around the world in our newest English spelling word game called Spelling Challenge! Are you good enough in spelling to be able to make it into TOP20 global highscores?Spelling Challenge is a new educational English spelling game that will check your spelling skills in an entertaining and challenging way! The game contains hundreds of misspelled English words, addicting and original gameplay, global leaderboards and a lot of other features that will improve your spelling skills in an original and enjoyable way! You will never fail in spelling test at school again! How to play: There will be shown a word on a screen and your task is to decide if the word is spelled correctly or not! You must answer correctly a number of words that equals to "TODO" number to be able to progress to the next level! Watch out, in each level you can make max 5 mistakes. Also watch out for level limit shown under the word. If you lose the level, you can play it again (max three times), then you must start over. Scoring: Your score depends on your speed and number of mistakes you make. There is also an overall score = total score from all games you ever played, so more times you play = better score you get!Features:* Educational and challenging English vocabulary spelling game not only for kids but for all ages* Thousands of most misspelled words included* Great way to improve your spelling skills, grammar and vocabulary knowledge* Global leaderboards included - submit your score and compare it with other people all around the world* Share your score with your friends via facebook, google+, WhatsApp, twitter and other social networks* Review your spelling progress and words in which you made mistakes* A must game for all the spelling bee game fans* Simple to play, no need to read instructions* 100% free full version + no In-App purchases* From a creator of 5+ popular spelling gamesHave fun and if you find any bug or if you have any idea to improve the game, please let us know! comments: A giant mess of people who pay a ton of money to prey on anyone with impunity. Absolutely no rules regarding who or how often you can attack someone significantly lower in level. Even if you are stupid enough to pour money into this garbage, you will get your butt handed to you by someone else.

Has alot to keep you busy. For that i give 5 stars. Minus 1 star because certain features in the game cannot be unlocked unless you spend money. To me thats a recipe for a slow death. For i will soon be leaving guns of glory in a blaze of glory based on that alone.

You guys really need to do some balancing. It's ridiculous that a level 22 guy can just annihilate me when I'm level 10. Its pretty blatant that you're trying to force us to pay to play. You should make it to where you can only attack X levels below you and the further down you go, the less loot/xp you get, if you attack even or higher you get bonus loot/xp. Good game but needs rebalancing asap or your game will slowly die.

This is for the makers of this game you need to introduce rules so that players who either work for the makers or spend 100's to become strong very quickly... cannot destroy the enjoyment of the game for those of us who would like to grow in the game and play the game properly to become strong through perseverance and hard work... the cash rich players are ruining this game for everyone...

Need some updates like 2 simultaneously upgrade option. Less but more extensive research. Lengthy process is boring. I know by spending money u can get rid of it but money making shouldn't be always a concern.

Game is absolutely nothing like the commercial on you tube. Kingdom #152 never wins in the INN at the mystical raffle. If you have ever played an MMO game on a cell phone app you'll know exactly what to do. Spend money to advance. Great for killing time.

descriptionHTML:
Get ready for the next stage of warfare with the free strategy MMO Guns of Glory! GoG’s thrilling multiplayer RTS gameplay lets you raise your own powerful army to shoot down enemies and team up with friends from around the globe.

In Guns of Glory, you take the lead as a rising Lord in a Kingdom thrown into war! To become supreme ruler and seize the Crown of Destiny from the devious Cardinal, you’ll ally with the famous Three Musketeers, slay ferocious beasts, build your own magnificent Castle, engineer an unstoppable Airship, rally with friends to destroy enemies, and more!

FEATURES:

Strategy Warfare! Train an army of loyal Musketeers, manage your resources, construct devious traps and raid your enemies into oblivion, all in order to claim the crown and turn your Alliance into an unbeatable empire!

Powerful Airships! In an era of emerging progress and science, shoot down enemies and lead the attack with deadly advanced aircraft for a new level of RTS warfare. How will you customize your own flying warship?

World War! Seamless chat translation features make GoG’s multiplayer RTS and RPG gameplay richer than ever before – making friends from anywhere in the world has never been so simple.

Immersive MMO World! Guns of Glory brings the world of the Three Musketeers to life like you’ve never seen it before! Gorgeously rendered HD graphics and vivid, beautiful landscapes make all the action in this free strategy MMORPG spring to life!

Advanced RTS Combat! Set your own strategy to attack enemies and aid allies! Guns of Glory’s strategy MMORPG gameplay lets you customize your Airship, Estate, troops, buildings, equipment and more. Develop a game strategy to fit your own style in GoG and claim victory!

Empire Building! Construct a glorious fortified Estate, master a range of devastating skills and arm yourself with indestructible weapons to ensure your survival and success in this world of multiplayer strategy war!

comments: Graphics have glitches from time to time.  There's not a whole lot of choices to choose from other than what's being offered.  There are no way of earning diamonds to play the game other than buying them. I'd like to see more ways of earning tickets rather than buying or just waiting for it to regenerate. I'd also love to hear the characters speak.

It is addicting! I love the graphics and how everything plays out! You are always hanging on edge, biting your nails and wondering, 'Whats gonna happen next?' Over all its awesome. Sometimes there are glitches but apart from that 5/5!

This is by far one of the best choices games I think I've ever played the graphics and animation is absolutely second to non, the story so far seems awesome and intriguing. The animation is beautiful and smooth and runs well on my phone. Please never change the way this game is. It gives you the option to buy things but it is very fair to those who can't pay due to money issues so I would definitely recommend this game. The developers should be proud of this game because it really is beautiful designed and made you can tell alot of care and effort went into perfecting this game. It's worth the wait on each episode, I love the stats from other players feature and how you can go back for free to see how different choices would of effect the game differently. All round a very professionally well built game 10 out of 10 wish I could give it more stars it deserves more than 5 :D.
I really like the plots to this game and that it's in Rio. Interesting love story. No matter how much I put Linda with Bruno, she loves Rodrigo.  It's very addictive
I find myself watching the clock for the next episodes. Great app but I wish you would change their wardrobe up. Most especially Marcia's.
It's alright I guess, just need more choices and the music is so not lively but boreing.

descriptionHTML:
Welcome to a Spelling Master, a new educational game for all ages that will improve your English spelling skills in an entertaining and challenging way! The game is 100% free and does not contain any In-App purchases.

Spelling Master contains 7 different spelling games and highscores gameplay, so don't forget to submit your score at the end of the game to see who is the true Spelling Master! If you prefer playing with no limits, then check a Practice mode!

Go for highscores!

Game modes:
- One word 2 forms - 2 forms of one word to be shown, choose the correct one!
- Find Misspelled - out of 4 words (3 correct + 1 incorrect) choose the misspelled one!
- Find Correct - out of 4 words (3 misspelled + 1 correct) choose the correct one!
- Which Letter.. - remember a word on screen and then type a letter that lies on position X..!
- Decide - decide if the word on screen is correct or incorrect!
- Decide & Correct - decide if the word on screen is correct or incorrect and if incorrect choose the correct form!
- Multiple Choice - mark all the correct words!
- Practice - random category with no limits (no lives, no time limit).

Scoring & limits:
- your points depend on your speed, faster you find the answer more points you get
- some puzzles have time limit, some rounds and in all of them you are also limited by number of lives
- you can review points of other people by pressing the star icons in the main menu

Features:

* Entertaining English spelling game for all ages
* 7 different spelling games
* See your overall progress and stats for each game mode
* Review all the words you played with in each game
* Local highscores - storing your best points for each mode
* Global highscores - submit your score and review points of other people from all around the world!
* Share your score via facebook, google+, whatsapp and other social networks
* Each game is different
* Hundreds of most misspelled English words included
* A must game for all the spelling bee fans
* 100% free full version with no In-App purchases

Have a nice time playing our word game Spelling Master and if you like the game and want to support it please leave a review and rate the game. Thank you for your support!

descriptionHTML:

descriptionHTML:
This application will help you to install one of the most popular mods for Minecraft Pocket Edition - Furniture.
Whitch includes:

-DL Box (Purple Shulker) – Unboxes the furniture which you want to get
-Computer (Black Shulker) – Decoration only
-Statue (White Shulker) – Use a name tag to name it
-Radio (Red Shulker) – Give it a gold ingot to play a song
-Table (Orange Shulker) – Storage container, drop items on table, then long press on it to access the items
-Chair (Yellow Shulker) – Sittable
-Fridge (Green Shulker) – Store food items
-Coffee Table (Lime Shulker) – Storage container, drops items on table, then long press on it to access the items
-Stool (Blue Shulker) – Sittable
-Blender (Cyan Shulker) – Blend apples, melons, potatoes and carrots into potions
-BBQ Grill (Light Blue Shulker) – Cook your raw meat and fish
-Safe / Vault (Magenta Shulker) – Hide your important items
-Bin (Pink Shulker) – Drop your items in the bin. You can collect them by long pressing on it.
-Bathtub (Gray Shulker) – You can sit in the bathtub. But first you need to fill it up with some water. Use some soap (Light Gray Dye) to add some water and then have a seat. -You can empty the bathtub by long pressing on it with an empty bucket.
-Toilet (Brown Shulker) – Sittable

One click easy to install.

Attention: this application is created for connoisseurs of quality pastime. We are not manufacturers (Mojang AB) or a subsidiary of Minecraft Pocket Edition. The name Minecraft, the brand and assets of Minecraft are the property of Minecraft Mojang AB or its owner. All rights reserved.
http://account.mojang.com/documents/brand_guidelines

title: Mod Furniture for MCPE

comments: Absolutely love all of the geometry dash games! Colors and graphics are awesome, game play is challenging but fun, and the music is perfect! Only thing I can complain about is that I wish all of the levels from these free versions were in the full version. I own the full version and would much prefer to be able to play these levels without ads and with all of the cool characters and colors I have unlocked. Other than that though, amazing work you guys, keep it up!

Woah. WOAH. WWOOAAHH!!! Oh. Another Chllenging game but thhe only thing i like in it tha it has Dantdm's Old Intro at the press start! Wow. I am pro at Geometry Dash Games and another one oh yea and there is Sub Zero(MK) name there like i saw them quickly. And i would say for the creator: plz. Creator keep the good work! Ok!!! And make more Geometry Dash and can u make something more fun for more people to play with!!!

Oh my god... This is the best geometry dash free game I have ever played,  and is almost more fun than the full version.  Robtop, you have regained full respect after what happened with meltdown. I'm just speechless, at the amount of work that was put into these three levels, going from the camera angles to the animations. This game is not like meltdown,  which is three short amateur levels, but with three long, harder levels. This game is like a preview to 2.2, and I know it's going to be good.  We'll done, Robtop! Keep up the great work!

This just blows my mind... one thing I would like to see in the future is some rob-top made tutorials on how each editing items works in the game so other players can feel more comfortable making their own levels and not be intimidated by all the other fan made levels... I am one of those players who is intimidated by the other fan made levels... This could help young and creative minds to create their own levels their friends can enjoy. Thanks 10/10

I love this game so much.  Some of the effects and colours added into the game make it so fun to play and watch. Its challenging and thats what makes it fun. Its not like one of those games that are so easy you finish it in an hour. This game takes time and effort. Also the backround music is pretty cool. Especially nock em with headphones. controls are very easy to use, just tap to jump and usually hold to use the vehicles, so easy! This game is perfect and absolutely fun. I would highly recommend downloading geometry dash subzero.

Don't get me wrong, these new levels and songs are fun and addictive and all of the new stuff is awesome... but stop making new apps? Why not just update the original? It's kind of frustrating to have a paid version with stuff I've unlocked but have to deal with an unpaid version (aka, ads) and have to unlock skins and colors all over again because new apps keep being made.

comments: This is by far the best chess "trainer" for me.  It's got a nice flow and the game isn't "stupid" like most other chess apps/games I've played.  I plat at least a few games every night and I feel like it give me a nice challenge and makes me really think about the moves I'm making.  Especially at the higher difficulty levels.  Overall a great chess app with no glitches and a good brain inside of it.  A must for a chess player with any real skill at the game.

I really was worried it would be too easy or too tough. tho I am not a master, yet, I know my way around the board.  I realized it has been making me a spectacular player ..the computer does not just do the same dumb moves over and over its almost like its stalking me like prey around the board! ha great game!!!-!!

I love this game and the best brain exerciser game ever in the history.  The cool 3d view makes the game as if I am playing on the real board, very good graphics. However, it doesn't show the list of killed chessman during game play the only drawback. I am expecting this upgradation and this will be the perfect Android chess.

So far it's o.k. I like the fact that it is simply a chess game with no fancy sound effects or graphics. I see no real reason to have the higher difficulty levels locked out until they are beaten but they are. I got it to practice with. It is useful for that. It's not bad...Just a simple down to earth chess game

The game has been drawn because the other player has no legal move and is not in check. If they can ot move then I win because they cannot move to a legal position. The computer ends the games too early because they cannot be bothered to chase you around the board. You cannot unlock the higher difficulty games because it just says draw.

Not 100% sure how that works but the other person has their king and it's a stale mate and I have practically most of my pieces but to unlock harder levels I have to win. Does stalemate not count? I think its pretty stupid
description: Chess in your AndroidChess is a board game for two players. It is played on a square board, made of 64 smaller squares, with eight squares on each side. Each player starts with sixteen pieces: eight pawns, two knights, two bishops, two rooks, one queen and one king. The goal of the game is for each player to try and checkmate the king of the opponent. Checkmate is a threat ('check') to the opposing king which no move can stop. It ends the game.During the game the two opponents take turns to move one of their pieces to a different square of the board. One player ('White') has pieces of a light color; the other player ('Black') has pieces of a dark color. There are rules about how pieces move, and about taking the opponent's pieces off the board. The player with white pieces always makes the first move. Because of this, White has a small advantage, and wins more often than Black in tournament games.Chess is popular and is often played in competitions called chess tournaments. It is enjoyed in many countries, and is a national hobby in Russia.Features:- five different themes- seven levels of difficulty- two players mode- game assistant (Helper)- realistic graphics- sound effects- small size
descriptionHTML:
Chess in your Android

Chess is a board game for two players. It is played on a square board, made of 64 smaller squares, with eight squares on each side. Each player starts with sixteen pieces: eight pawns, two knights, two bishops, two rooks, one queen and one king. The goal of the game is for each player to try and checkmate the king of the opponent. Checkmate is a threat ('check') to the opposing king which no move can stop. It ends the game.

During the game the two opponents take turns to move one of their pieces to a different square of the board. One player ('White') has pieces of a light color; the other player ('Black') has pieces of a dark color. There are rules about how pieces move, and about taking the opponent's pieces off the board. The player with white pieces always makes the first move. Because of this, White has a small advantage, and wins more often than Black in tournament games.

Chess is popular and is often played in competitions called chess tournaments. It is enjoyed in many countries, and is a national hobby in Russia.

Features:

- five different themes
- seven levels of difficulty
- two players mode
- game assistant (Helper)
- realistic graphics
- sound effects
- small size
summary: Chess is a board logic game with beautiful graphics and progressive levels
title: Chess

comments: So far, not bad.  Update:  gathered enough parts to repair the university and it won't unlock.  I emailed the developer and haven't heard back.  It is such a cool concept with little to no support or point.  Why gather the materials if we can't use them?  Plus, it took weeks to get the stuff.  Like most cool games, nothing more than a good concept.

You had my attention, and now you have my money. Yes, this is a good game. However, it costs too much real money to advance this game. There are many missing pieces and too much to acquire to be able to progress. Maybe instead of making it so in depth, take it down a notch. Let people use junked cars to fix cars and sell them, if this is already an option make it easier to do so. I think this is a good game just too in depth and not enough give to make it entertaining and fun at this time.

Great time killer... Love it so far and only been playing since yesterday... Already level 11 and got quite a few things however I gave 4 stars because I spent 10 diamonds on the bank which showed the stock market but didn't tell me it was coming soon until I paid for it... I like that this game doesn't make you pay real cash and gives you tokens just to win more cash, diamonds, energy etc so please don't ruin the game in the future and make us pay 2 play =)

The game is over good. It's definitely fun for your car enthusiasts but I am now level 11 and I can't obtain "glass" to build any buildings... The game is getting boring because I can't move up, it's pretty much scrap cars and sell parts... I don't want to rate this game too high because I believe it still is a work in progress, but yes it's a good game and I would recommend it

It's a decent concept. Good time killer for a little while. I don't know why all these games take energy. Just let me play the damn game. And the constantly fluctuating prices to sell the parts got old REAL QUICK! Apparently the creators of this game have never been to a salvage yard in their life.

Great time killer! Simple to play, though a few information/help would be nice for a few items, the auto sell option and the bailer so you know exactly what they do.  The developer does listen to the players and fixes things! Only true issues that I have are 1)the materials needed to build the buildings in incredibly high, not really obtainable for game play, even for someone who would play constantly
description: Want to start your own vehicle business? If you love vehicles and automobiles, you will love this virtual business game of vehicles. It is unique and extremely entertaining.Junkyard Tycoon is a game where you start your own garbage garage, buy vehicles or vehicle parts, detach vehicle parts, sell them and make profit. While you slowly make good business out of junk vehicle parts, you become a junkyard tycoon.Just keep buying and selling vehicles or vehicle parts. The twist of the game is that you can make profit while selling different vehicle parts. You can buy Car,Truck,Motorbike,Boats  at scrapyard prices and you will be able to sell vehicle parts individually to make good money. It is a perfect way to test your business and money making skills. ‚ÄúJunkyard Tycoon‚Äù is the best time management game for unlimited fun and salvage yard business.The game is all about right set of Wreckers business skills needed at the right time.! Get ready for the most amazing vehicle business game where you can buy junk cars, trucks, vans, or any other moving parts of vehicles and test your business skills to become a real Magnate. Focus and play carefully! This is an amazing business strategy game.Decide on your business strategy to balance out your income and expenses. The Wrecking Yard economy game is really fun with thrilling sound effects and beautiful game graphics. Download the game and start your own Scrapheap Challenge.************************SAY HELLO************************We are constantly working hard on making the ‚ÄúJunkyard Tycoon‚Äù game better and more entertaining for you. We need your constant support to get going. Please feel free to email us for any queries/suggestions/problems or if you just want to say hello. We would love to hear from you. If you have enjoyed any feature of the game, do not forget to rate us on play store and share among your friends.

comments: I absolutely love this game it is really fun and challenging . It is fun because you can make your person anything you want. It is challenging because you have to get your person done in a short amount of time. I loved this game right after I did the first round. All you haters who don't like it I don't know what you're talking about.

I wasn't impressed. The game is fun but maybe for a much younger audience. The graphics are good.You basically do the same thing over and over again.There is no real goal or end to it. You pick a battle and get matched to an opponent. Then you have have 30 seconds (which is way to short by the way) to throw an outfiit/look together,from clothing, shoes and hair style varietys that they offer. But your opponent has all the same options and stuff.In the end 3 Judges decide who looks better and you either loose or win money which then you can spend to enter another battle. I wish they had a shop where you could purchase other clothing and styles to make it more interesting and so you maybe have stuff that your opponent doesn't own/have (yet)!
This cheets the votes all give me 2's and gives the other contestant 5's so unfair don't get it its. A waist of storageüòï

Best game ever i swear for those who read comments before they download here's a note: DOWNLAOD this i swear you will NOT regret it!!!! :)
It sucks you don't even have enuf time to desine a decent outfit, they time you. Give Us Some Time!!!

I won all challenges so far I hope I can keep up the good work!!!! If you don't like this game I don't know what will get you from sitting in one spot in front of the TV!!!!üòÉüòÉ
description: Dress Up Battle : Fashion Game is unique in the girl games collection because you can race in a dress up contest.We've carefuly selected the best we've found regarding dressup games with some updates and we've created an exceptional fashion game in which you need to carefully choose designer clothes for all kind of themes like a walk in the park or an appropiate school dress up outfit.Everything is against time and you must choose between lots of combinations of clothes and accesories to create the perfect outfit.After you finish the outfit design , the jury in dress up battle will assign the winning fashionista.The winning fashionista will be chosen based on 3 marks given by different persons and the marks will be given for originality, right colors , theme chosen and matching clothes.If you think that a simple jeans dress will help you win this dress up contest , it means that you have the wrong opinion about the competition you are in.Either you wish to become a designer for fashion houses or a successful model , Dress Up Battle : Fashion Game is the perfect place in which you have to test your fashionista skills and create adequate outfits for different ocassions and all under the surveilance of fashion experts and of course , against time.After creating her account , every fashionista that wants to participate at our dress up contest will have to choose a theme for which it has to design the perfect outfit and to be able to enter the contest it has to put some coins in play.If you win the contest you will earn coins , but if you don't create the winning outfit you will loose coins in the dress up contest.So , girls , we wish you goodluck in Dress Up Battle : Fashion Game , may the best fashionista win !Game Features:- over 200 possible dressup outfits- play against any random dressup fashionista- choose from 10 different fashion games- incredible fashion game items and different gameplay themes to chose from
descriptionHTML:
Dress Up Battle : Fashion Game is unique in the girl games collection because you can race in a dress up contest.

We've carefuly selected the best we've found regarding dressup games with some updates and we've created an exceptional fashion game in which you need to carefully choose designer clothes for all kind of themes like a walk in the park or an appropiate school dress up outfit.

Everything is against time and you must choose between lots of combinations of clothes and accesories to create the perfect outfit.

After you finish the outfit design , the jury in dress up battle will assign the winning fashionista.

The winning fashionista will be chosen based on 3 marks given by different persons and the marks will be given for originality, right colors , theme chosen and matching clothes.
If you think that a simple jeans dress will help you win this dress up contest , it means that you have the wrong opinion about the competition you are in.

Either you wish to become a designer for fashion houses or a successful model , Dress Up Battle : Fashion Game is the perfect place in which you have to test your fashionista skills and create adequate outfits for different ocassions and all under the surveilance of fashion experts and of course , against time.

After creating her account , every fashionista that wants to participate at our dress up contest will have to choose a theme for which it has to design the perfect outfit and to be able to enter the contest it has to put some coins in play.

If you win the contest you will earn coins , but if you don't create the winning outfit you will loose coins in the dress up contest.

So , girls , we wish you goodluck in Dress Up Battle : Fashion Game , may the best fashionista win !

Game Features:
- over 200 possible dressup outfits
- play against any random dressup fashionista
- choose from 10 different fashion games
- incredible fashion game items and different gameplay themes to chose from
summary: Dress Up Battle : Fashion Game - may the best fashionista win !
title: Dress Up Battle : Fashion Game

comments: Nice game with very good events but the drop rates to heroes of 5 star is too low i killed a lot of gems and scrols and hero orbs and my first 5 star i  dropped it at lvl 75. Okok now again event of summoning 100 scrolls and i continue still no 5 star hero only 4, just try and fix the drop rate. In the rest its a nice game.

Too much pay to win, free players hardly getting anywhere in the events and so fourth, not fair, increase the rewards of spending money and give free players more too easily solved, I previously rated it 5 stars instantly loved it but as I've progressed it's just not fair!! Please do something!! I am vip6 but I'm not rich, please bring more rewards for loyal free users who watch the ads and everything!! Thank you!!

I purchased the spring festival card on top of all the money I've already dumped into this game and the devs didn't give me my in game rewards. I've submitted numerous tickets to get a refund or my rewards and they just reply there is no problem. Ya no problem with you taking my money.  They deleted my review, wonder how many other people had this issue and had reviews deleted.

Wasn't sure about this game at first. I love it. I use a f2p  and a vip one  to see  the difference  between the two. Really well done. Having said all that the game does require patience. This is an IDLE game. You pick it up do dailies, talk, spend money, or what ever you want to do in game, then put it down to "farm gold,xp,mats". The high end heros do take some planning to aquire as a f2p player. This game requires patience because it's an IDLE game. Yes some people have a ton of money to throw at the game but don't be jealous, just play your game and have fun.

Honestly gameplay and all is good but the game is so p2w it's not funny, it would cost u over a hundred dollars just to complete every reward for new Valentine's event. If you like this game play private server instead this version is a giant cash grab. Not competitive for f2p at all

Not what I expected, given that my first impression of it was of IH being an "annoying add". Once I decided to pick it up though my thoughts changed rather drastically.   It's simple, it's fun and the warm colour palette of the graphics make a nice change compared to the widespread use of bleak colours in other games.   If you think you might enjoy this game, you sure are my friend.

descriptionHTML:
"Android Excellence Game" of Google Play. Play with 12 million global players!
Join millions of other players around the world and start your journey from Sara Forest to the High Heaven, leading your band of heroes into ancient ruins to battle the forces of darkness!

GAME FEATURES:

★IDLE System★
Set your heroes training while you’re away. When you return to your phone, they will be stronger, gained new abilities, and ready for battle. Grow & Train a powerful squad without all the grinding!

★Evolving Strategy★
More than 200 Heroes in different factions with specific skills. Summon your Warriors, TRAIN them to become powerful heroes, or convert them into Spirit material for EVOLVING. Forge magical gears, and outfit your warriors for victory!

★TONS of Content★
With battlegrounds galore and dungeons aplenty, heroic quests, mysterious towers, arena, guild, much fun to enjoy!

★GUILD Wars★
Fight alongside your friends and players everywhere in a war for control of the floating continent. Join multiplayer guild boss-battles and lead your guild to supremacy!

★Worldwide Arena★
Put forth your best heroes to do battle in the ARENA. Watch them PK online in a multiplayer contest for glory! Climb the Leader board for the best rewards!

comments: Great game. NEEDS:  *Multi player game. Compete vs friends *The same minimum bid on every unit. Regardless of what its contents are. As the level goes up, maybe the minimum increases slightly.  *Tools!!!! Ive never seen a pawn shop without tools. We need tools *Cars, go carts, motorcyles, 4wheelers. Wheres that stuff at?. *Guns, no guns either. Like civil war era type items, unless these are all avaliable at much higher levels.
Overall this game is fun. Only bad thing to say is there is way too many ads. I believe it discourages you from playing the game longer due yo an ad every like 30 seconds

Really liked this game to start off. Good fun to play but it starts to get near impossible to unlock the next areas without purchasing in-game money which really annoyed me. Have to keep repeating the same levels over and over hoping you eventually get enough money gathered up. It's more likely you will just purchase in-game money from them or in my case, get bored repeating levels and end up un-installing

SUPER  ADDICTIVE  Time killer for sure.... This game has awesome graphics as well as controls. I literally stopped playing others games for this one. The only dislikes about this game is the ADS. Other than that this game is awesome and requires patience once the energy level is down.
Good game. No glitches. Easy to build up your shop. You can get caught out trying to bid-up the game players. If there becomes Multi-player mode & more updates I will rate 5*

Game was going ok the bam , hit a brick wall and all of a sudden bidding went stupid.. you either go backwards because you don't win any bids or you lose thousands on the ones you do " win " on.  Very disappointing.   Clearly set up for those buying players who spend money to play.

description: The Decorate Your Walk In Closet game is a great room decoration game which is capable of releasing your inner interior designer. This game is great fun for everyone to enjoy and allows you to make up your own closet just the way you want it to be.You can decorate this decoration game with wall paper, lighting, ceiling color, flooring, lounge suites, rug, wall decorations, handbag shelving, floor decorations, clothes shelving, jewellery shelving and shoe shelving. This game works by simply clicking on each separate icon multiple times to change the decoration or color of each section the icons represent. You will see each item magically appear and change in front of your eyes. If you want to go back to the basics and restart over all you have to do is press the ‚Äúreset‚Äù button at the bottom left hand side of the screen and your room will go back to the way it was when you first started. This shoes closet decoration game is great fun and can give you plenty of ideas for your own closet design in your own home. With so many decoration games fun you can have, you really can‚Äôt go wrong with the inspiring and great Decorate Your Walk In Closet game today!
descriptionHTML:
The Decorate Your Walk In Closet game is a great room decoration game which is capable of releasing your inner interior designer. This game is great fun for everyone to enjoy and allows you to make up your own closet just the way you want it to be.

You can decorate this decoration game with wall paper, lighting, ceiling color, flooring, lounge suites, rug, wall decorations, handbag shelving, floor decorations, clothes shelving, jewellery shelving and shoe shelving.

This game works by simply clicking on each separate icon multiple times to change the decoration or color of each section the icons represent. You will see each item magically appear and change in front of your eyes. If you want to go back to the basics and restart over all you have to do is press the “reset” button at the bottom left hand side of the screen and your room will go back to the way it was when you first started.

This shoes closet decoration game is great fun and can give you plenty of ideas for your own closet design in your own home. With so many decoration games fun you can have, you really can’t go wrong with the inspiring and great Decorate Your Walk In Closet game today!
summary: Decorate the walk in closet of your dream girl with this fun decorating game.
title: Decorate your walk-in closet

Don't waste your precious 30 seconds of gameplay time! There are just so many games out there that are better, even Flappy Bird. However, the funny fail screens make it only a bit better.

It then showed me running and it said who made it, who was the director, the music and voices. Then it told me to press retry from start. It put me the whole way back. While the game was fairly short, it was also very well done. I think many of the reviews saying it was boring or saying they "beat it in five minutes" didn't get the point of the game. The point of the game is more about seeing all the different possibilities rather than winning. For this reason it's mostly a matter of whether or not you enjoy the creator's sense of humor which I greatly enjoy. Nothing about this game is perfect, but nothing is bad either. All in all this is an awesome series of games.

descriptionHTML:
Are you ready to face your fears?

You are in a hospital corridor which fear and horror in nested.
You are feeling which fear and death pester to you in every step.

In a hospital which contains paranormal activities, it is very difficult to survive if your nerves is not hard as steel.
You can't determine who is angel who is devil.

Extraordinary atmosphere, nervous scenario and blood-curdling flow, you are one step ahead of comic book horror game.

In second story, young girl couldn't get rid of nightmares and curiosity. There is only way to get rid of this hell which threaten her mental health. Face it! Of course young man won't leave alone the girl and our story continues from where it left.

If you have courage, what are you waiting for?

- Amazing graphics
- Detailed areas
- Unique musics
- Completely free

comments: It's really really really fun game.  But I think if you guys do some more improvements so it will be much fun.  Here's what I think:  1. I think you should make the house much bigger.  2. Where you need to find some books or something like an emblem like that stuff to make them uncursed like that.  4. Last but not least, you should add more weapons for example:  Pistol,  sword,  injection etc.    If you do that,  it will be super cool and fun.   ThanQ üòÉüëç

It's definatly one of the better (more fun) horror games on the store, but I feel like there could be some more improvements. Firstly I think that if you've completed hard than there should be an (almost) impossible mode. Also minor details such as different textures and Easter eggs would be good. Last, I think that when you escape there should be an outside section where it's still got puzzles but it's more about the atmosphere. (Maybe that could just be for the "impossible mode") but it would make the game a lot more enjoyable. Also maybe a reward for escaping. (For incentive). Thank you and maybe you could take this into consideration :) also new app icon plz

Who doesn't love this game? It's bone chilling and exciting for the whole family (Litterally my whole fam plays this game) it would be cool to have a mode where there was no granny just to explore the house and get a feel for how to escape. Also some weapons to attack granny. Lastly a map of where granny is would be super cool. Good luck!

This is an early game with a bunch of potential. I love the game and I'm always playing it but I feel like you can expand the game with these additions. Firstly, why not add in a collectible menu where you can hunt extremely hard-to-find collection of items within Granny's house. Also you could possibly add another, backdoor exit to the house. This would mean being able to escape a different way. Finally you could add another whole game mode where you escape the house in a different way. (You could even add in a whole new mechanic but don't make it too complex!)

This is definitely the best game I've downloaded! Can you please add some more weapon boxes all unlockable with one key? And put like guns and things in. Granny doesn't stay tranquilized long enough. BEST IDEA EVER!! Make it so there is a granny in the forest and go into another house with granny in.

Thus is the best thing since sliced bread! üòÇüòÇ Its the best horror app ive ever played.. It is so deep.. really deep. Ive found all the secrets in one day. And let me tell you, Granny has a serious problem with bear traps.. üòÇüòÇ Please keep up the good work! I beg you to nake more games like this! I LOVE GRANNY LOL  üòÜüòÇüòçüòó
description: Welcome to Granny.Granny keeps you locked in her house.Now you have to try to get out of her house, but be careful and quiet. She hears everything.If you drop something on the floor, she hears it and comes running.You can hide in wardrobes or under beds.You have 5 days.Good luck!The game contains advertisement.
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Granny.

Granny keeps you locked in her house.
Now you have to try to get out of her house, but be careful and quiet. She hears everything.
If you drop something on the floor, she hears it and comes running.
You can hide in wardrobes or under beds.
You have 5 days.

Good luck!

The game contains advertisement.
recentChanges: * Opportunity to get a bonus day (only Normal and Easy).
* An extra lock on the main door (Only Hard).
* Now you can drop items on beartraps to disarm them.
summary: Granny keeps you locked in her house.
title: Granny

comments: Graphics and cars are very good. But extremely boring game. It will take eternity to get even 2nd car. Only few mony we get in one race and car costs in ten thousands..i am playing this game from 6 months but still not able to buy the very first car named tiger. Why so much struggle bro.?

Very fun racing game, could gravity controls at nice Maps. Difficult enough to to make me keep playing over and over and over to open the next level. You can advance a lot faster by upgrading your car if you spend money but you can also accumulate points through racing to get the same upgrades

Nice gameplay,  although has a Asphalt 8-like gameplay. The problem is that the cars are expensive,  and I mean TOO expensive. Although the controls are the best.  The car graphics are ok,  but the badges are removed to keep their license. Although you can change your name,  their is no multiplayer mode. The CPU,  on the other hand, are easy then they get aggressive once you move on. Although,  this game is not right.

Quite a good game but it takes forever to get a new car. Still a great game though but the cars aint getting any better when you buy a new one. This game could be improved much more and the instructions should be in proper english. Woyld recommend  but if you tjink you are up for the challenge, tou should download this game.

This game is very glitchy and it lags like crazy.  It is very hard to control the car with all of the lagging that is going on.  I thought this game would be legit, not this phony trash.  I can't believe it is rated a 4.5.  That is  pretty high rating.  I would not recommend this game.  This game is terrible.  I would never ever recommend this.  No!  Never ever again!

Those of you who rate this a good game are lying. This game is sooo terrible. It plays so stiff feels really blocky. This game is so weak maybe if your under 15 u can appreciate it but other than that the game is WEAK

comments: I think it's a good game but sometimes the ball would go in but then it bounces out you should also add modes, one like there are walls all around and I like the game keep making these addictive games:D also all you guys stop with the adds just turn off your WiFi let them have some money after hard work on many game's like would you want to make a game and not get money and just get  ALL YOUR COMMENTS WITH ADDS! ohhh that would be soo annoying.

I love the game it is so simple yet super fun. Just the only down side is that there are WAY to many ads. I stared playing a round and then an ad pops up.. Like really. At least put a 15 second ad up after the round is finished where you can choose to wat h and ad to continue after you have missed and your time is up. If that person skips the chance then put up and ad. Or just remove them. Thank you dev for the lovely game though ¬∂:

Don't get me wrong this app is addicting and fun. The thing that ruins this app is ads. For a game were it is meant to be played in quick bursts and you aren't meant to succeed for long periods of time, i don't understand how you can put an ad after every attempt. Sure one per 3 to 5 games and the another 30 second ad, but at the rate they come this game isn't fun anymore. The craziest thing to me is that i can't find a way to invest a few cents into the app to perma-block the ads. Come on dev i know you can do better than this. I will adjust the rating when i am offered a solution. Until then this 4 to 5 star app has 1 to 2 star potential.

Ya hate ads? Turn off wifi and play. Stupid phone/gaming noobs. Its a good game and dont hate on it for ads. The ads make the people who made the game MONEY. Give then a break. Let them have money while u watch something u might want. If u wanna turn it off, like i said, turn off wifi.

It would be 5 stars if for one, the ball didn't just disappear more or less everytime it goes of the screen. And two, if the ball actually moved when i tap the screen rather than decide to just lay on the ground like a dead badger. As for reason three, there are waaaay to many ads. It asks me if i want to watch an ad to continue so then i press no and it still makes me watch an ad, that's just cheap. I understand they have to make money but this is a whole different story here. But  when it does decide to work and when i turn my wifi off, its pretty fun.
Would pay for the game to remove ads. I get you can turn off WiFi/data but it shouldn't be necessary, and is unfair to the company itself. Please offer a paid ad-free version!

comments: This is a really good game. I tend to be cynical about mobile games because they're usually pay to win these days but this game seems to have a very fair progression system. It's also refreshing that it's single player. That seems to be getting rare these days. My one suggestion is that there be more levels and things to do. I've only been playing for 4 days and I'm already nearing the end of the campaign. Add more missions or maybe another game mode and this game will easily earn 5 stars from me.

controls take a while to get used to. also for the past month or so, the game doesn't seem to recognize the network my cellphone is connected to which doesn't allow me to get log in bonus or fight the bosses. please fix this glitch and if possible add co-op missions

I Love This Game Very Much. I Play This Game Every Day To Complete My All Tasks. You Need Some Improvements When I Killed 500 Enemies "The Message is Displayed 100 Enemies Killed". I Have AGM U61 Tracking Missile When i Shoot 1 Missile & 9 Missiles Are Gone From My Clips Section, WHY? One More Thing in 5th or 6th Chapter When All Enemies Are Attacked Our Helicopter The Game is Very Slow For A Few Seconds Like BUFFERING or Something So Please Fix These Problems. Rare Weapons Are Truly RARE We Cannot Buy These Weapons So How Can I Buy These Weapons. Slot is Not The Right Answer. Please Reply Me. Now I Need More Tough Rounds & Chapters To Play So Please Upgrade or Develop A New Game. Fix Fix Fix These Problems.

Great time passer! This is one of the better helicopter games I have played. The sound effects are realistic along with graphics and gameplay. No regrets or bad feelings from me. This game is on both phones and my tablet. Love it!

update game and increase more level and There are some Item which we will never  unlock and get up to 2-3 years and signIn problem facing even it is Not completed 30 days i lost my all progress just because of Poor Technology and Software error auto rejected progress i want back my all Progress i was completed 25 days Journey.
Signin start again from 1st day before completing 30 days, even i play this game daily. That's why i am not getting machine gun design.

comments: Graphics are crystal clear, game play is easy to understand, assists in majority of the steps needed to build and upgrade your city buildings and troops and a dragon. Play in tournaments, and get rewards to assist in your upgrading. What's not to love,  course I'd like to see this game run without an internet connection so I could play offline too...thanks.

The game is supposed to be for battling your enemy but you spend countless hours sorting through the packs which are random at best in content offering very little for the price paid. They encourage you to register the game with an email account but give you the run around should you seek to change it. The game is not worth the time nor money.

Was addictive so I spent 25 over 5 weeks. Not knowing there are no rules on who hits who. High level player just continue to beat down on low level player. Nothing to even it out except spend money. Shame on you game designers

OH MY GOD!!! ARE YOU KIDDING ME WITH THIS?!?! I DOWNLOADED THE APP JUST TO RATE IT. YOUR AD, IS IDENTICAL TO CLASH OF CLANS!!!! THIS IS JUST PATHETIC. BEING A CLASH OF CLANS PLAYER, I FIND THIS VERY INSULTING AND DISRESPECTFUL. HAVE FUN WITH MY 1 STAR REVIEW!!!

description: Offroad Bike Racing is an exciting and realistic bike racing game. Ride your Bike on dangerous hilly roads and treacherous terrains. comments: Game is awesome! Butt! It would be better if I could replay my amazing shots lol.  And a better aimer that's not so close to the edge of the screen would be nice. Still a pretty awesome game though,  in my opinion. Probably ridiculously hard for some of you who aren't as good as me but we can't all be pro lmao

Its a great game but the ads on the top of the screen during gameplay aren't cool. It messes with my shots. If you get rid of that I'll give a 5 ‚òÜ rating. I understand that when a game is free the company needs to add ads to make money, but during gameplay on the screen is a little extensive. I don't usually give anything less than five stars,  I'm genuinely sorry. A quick reply would be much appreciated, thanks for your time.

Ruined by ads Well.. I quite liked the game until I finished the first level.. then ads... ads... and more bloody ads... do not get this if you like your game play to be fluid!!!!!  If you like to play a game for 10 seconds then watch 30 seconds of ads every level.. then this game is for you.. I have now uninstalled it.. if I could give minus stars then I would

The same ad ran, after every other level, just too much. I would never dl the advertised game due to it being shoved at me repeatedly. Not much in creativity, a lot of the same scenes just a move of the cup or an added piece. Uninstalled before I get further annoyed.

Fun game, but advertisements are WAAAAAY too frequent to actually enjoy the game (practically every 3rd round). Install if you'd like or don't mind ads all the time, but I didn't make it before deciding to uninstall. Game is absolutely in no way new or ground breaking so you'd be better off with any of the other similar games with far fewer forced ads.

I said if one more add comes up, I'm deleting this game. There is literally a 1 minute add after every single level. This game sucks so bad. I kept my word and uninstalled it. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS. It's not worth it at all.

descriptionHTML:
Rocket to the finish line in Turbo FAST, the top mobile racing game!

Challenge your friends for slick shell upgrades and delicious tomato prize pools!

Head down to the Garage where Tito will show you the ropes and help you trick-out your own sweet ride!

Race, drift, slide and jump your way to the top of the Leaderboards!

The best survivor royale esque game you can find on the play store. Takes up immensely less space than others like Rules of Survival. Anyone can play this, no matter the quality of their phone. It's intense solo, duo, and squad gameplay will always have you coming back to take a shot (no pun intended) at another win. An amazing feature is it's voice chat communication system. You can talk to your teammates (though unfortunately, I find most players speak Spanish. You may have more luck.) though i wish there was a text chat as well. It will hopefully come in the next update, bur I would definitely recommend getting this game. My only other suggestion is new maps, a night mode, more weapons, and attachments.

This is a really great game, I think it can go to heights where it'll have a PC version with a bigger city, more weapon's and kill tactics. It should really consider creating a store which has more item's though . Also can you add gas cans strategicallyy to the game, I'd love to blow up someone hiding in a factory :) . Other than that, its a gteT game , I'm at Level 13  and have tons of kills already in all modes so I figured you deserve a review at this point.   Keep up the great work, I love this game so far.

description: Free Fire - Battlegrounds is the ultimate survival shooter game available on mobile. Each 10-minute game places you on a remote island where you are pit against 50 other players, all seeking survival. Players freely choose their starting point with their parachute, and aim to stay in the safe zone for as long as possible. Drive vehicles to explore the vast map, hide in trenches, or become invisible by proning under grass. Ambush, snipe, survive, there is only one goal: to survive.[Form guilds]Form the strongest guild and let it rip on the battlegrounds![Battlegrounds in its original form]Search for weapons, stay in the play zone, loot your enemies and become the last man standing. Along the way, go for airdrops while avoiding airstrikes to gain that little edge against other players.[10 minutes, 50 players, epic survival goodness awaits]Within 10 minutes, a new survivor will emerge. Will it be you?[4-man squad, with in-game voice chat]Create squads of up to 4 players and establish communication with your squad at the very first moment. Command your friends to victory and be the last team standing.[Realistic and smooth graphics]Easy to use controls and smooth graphics promises the best survival experience you will find on mobile.[Contact us]Facebook: https://facebook.com/freefireEN
descriptionHTML:
Free Fire - Battlegrounds is the ultimate survival shooter game available on mobile. Each 10-minute game places you on a remote island where you are pit against 50 other players, all seeking survival. Players freely choose their starting point with their parachute, and aim to stay in the safe zone for as long as possible. Drive vehicles to explore the vast map, hide in trenches, or become invisible by proning under grass. Ambush, snipe, survive, there is only one goal: to survive.

[Form guilds]
Form the strongest guild and let it rip on the battlegrounds!

[Battlegrounds in its original form]
Search for weapons, stay in the play zone, loot your enemies and become the last man standing. Along the way, go for airdrops while avoiding airstrikes to gain that little edge against other players.

[10 minutes, 50 players, epic survival goodness awaits]
Within 10 minutes, a new survivor will emerge. Will it be you?

[4-man squad, with in-game voice chat]
Create squads of up to 4 players and establish communication with your squad at the very first moment. Command your friends to victory and be the last team standing.

[Realistic and smooth graphics]
Easy to use controls and smooth graphics promises the best survival experience you will find on mobile.

[Contact us]
Facebook: https://facebook.com/freefireEN

comments: So I LOVE THIS GAME. I beat it once and had to uninstall it due to space issues. I couldn't find it until now. It is a very nice game controls graphics everything on point. Overall my review is 4 stars. ONLY because it needs more levels as the difficulties aren't extra levels but just harder  versions of those so maybe more levels and islands if possible and more stick warriors and it can even go into the skies or galaxy or so although I don't know if that sounds like too much but more levels. If it had multiplayer (online as optional) also, so u can play offline but if u want multiplayer u get online. I'm not trying to be picky. Such an awesome game finished too quickly.

Great game. Seriously like my fav app. One minor glitch they needed to patch though is that, at least for me, it's not giving me the achievements for the zombie mode. Like I've survived 24 nights but I don't even have the achievements for"survive 5 nights". I should have all the achievements unlocked but I don't because some of the zombie achievements I'm not receiving for some reason. But besides that minor annoyance, it really is a sweet app.i used to play the classic version back in the day and I was so happy when I found out they made it into an app. Right now my goal is to win the tournament mode on insaine 100 times, I'm currently at 59. GG!
Its a good game up until you play on anything other than normal. The upper difficulties make it impossible to progress past spartans unless you buy gems and get power ups, smh

I wish there were more commands. Like maybe you could command the miners to garrison while the rest of the troops guard. Also, redesign the swordwrath helmet. It looks like someone spray painted their hair gold and then glued jewels on it. I also wish there could be more types of zombies. The idea of endless is cool but please add the zombies to the campaign.

This is one of the most awesome game of all time and thanks to the creators you can play it on mobile too. But it still lack some awesome components, 1. Add Chaos Empire, 2. Add multiplayer!!! Overall still AWESOME!!!

You know,  its a shame because this is a fantastic game. There is ZERO balancing. The entire game is designed to force you into using gems and micro transactions to get past abnormally difficult gameplay walls.
description: One of the most popular and highest rated web games of all time now comes to mobile!Play the game Stick War, one of the biggest, most fun, challenging and addicting stick figure games. Control your army in formations or play each unit, you have total control of every stickman. Build units, mine gold, learn the way of the Sword, Spear, Archer, Mage, and even Giant. Destroy the enemy statue, and capture all Territories!New Features:‚óè	Endless Deads zombie survival mode! How many nights can you last?‚óè	Comic book style cinematic intro for Endless Deads! ‚óè	Tournament mode! Battle your way through dozens of Ai challengers to win the "Crown of Inamorta!"Campaign Mode:In a world called Inamorta, you're surrounded by discriminate nations devoted to their individual nations technology and struggle for dominance. Each nation has developed its own unique way to defend and attack. Proud of their unique craft they have become obsessed to the point of worship, turning weapons to religion. Each believe that their way of life is the only way, and are dedicated to teaching their polices to all other nations through what there leaders claim as divine intervention, or as you will know it... war. The others are known as: "Archidons" the way of the archer, "Swordwrath" the way of the sword, "Magikill" the way of the mage, and "Speartons" the way of the Spear. You are the leader of the nation called "Order", your way is of peace and knowledge, your people do not worship their weapons as gods. This makes you a mark for infiltration by the surrounding nations. Your only chance to defend is to attack first, and obtain the technology's from each nation along the way.

comments: I saw this game earlier back in 2017, but was reluctant to try it. Though I'm very glad I decided to try it out today, because the first several minutes were pretty awesome. The music on the title especially got me hyped to play. I'll probably be keeping this one for a while.

At a first glance, I figured this would be a typical mobile game where you tap once and you kill the same enemy over and over again or something dumb. But it's more than that. Soul Knight is a multiplayer dungeon crawler where you and your friends use awesome weapons to royally plow your foes. It's awesome. If you're looking for a way to kill time, my government class feels like it's only a few minutes long with this game. And thanks to wifi direct, I can play with my friend across the room from me. Keep the updates coming üëåüëç

descriptionHTML:
“In a time of gun and sword, the magical stone that maintains the balance of the world is stolen by high-tech aliens. The world is hanging on a thin thread. It all depends on you retrieving the magical stone…”

We honestly can’t keep making it all up. Let’s just shoot some alien minions!

This is the game you have always wanted in your subconscious. Explore the dungeon, collect crazy weapons, dodge bullets and shoot‘em all up! Extremely easy and intuitive control; super smooth and enjoyable gameplay, mixed with rogue-like elements. Best shooter game you will find on the mobile store so far.

Features:
* Unique heroes, with unique ability.
* 170+ weapons waiting for you to explore.
* Randomly generated dungeon world, new experience every time.
* NPCs that actually matter! They will fight by your side!
* Auto-aim mechanism for super intuitive control.
* Many more features that you will find out in game.

Facebook: @chillyroomsoulknight

Are You Ready?In this free app, you can transform into one of four Ben 10 Aliens, Diamondhead, Heatblast, Stinkfly or Four Arms, each with their own unique facial interactions and character specific animations. descriptionHTML:
Be Ben, be an alien, be the hero! Are You Ready?

In this free app, you can transform into one of four Ben 10 Aliens, Diamondhead, Heatblast, Stinkfly or Four Arms, each with their own unique facial interactions and character specific animations. Then take on Zombozo and his robots in 360-degree augmented reality action!

With Ben 10 Alien Experience you get two apps in one, a super cool face swapper and an action-packed robot blaster. Use your device’s camera and see the transformation take place in front of your very eyes as you become one of Ben Tennyson’s amazing alien forms.

Warm things up as Heatblast and experience his fiery powers or chill out as Diamondhead and see icicles appear all around you! Become Stinkfly and shoot out slime balls or smash things up as Four Arms. Take photos and record short videos straight to your device before sharing them with family and friends!

The fun doesn’t end once you transform! Take your device and save the day from waves enemies that only you can see. Use your alien’s powers to defend yourself from Zomboso and his robots in augmented reality gameplay. Use your device as a radar to find and destroy endless hordes of enemies in exciting 360-degree action.

It’s Hero Time!

**********

This game is available in the following languages: English, French, Spanish, Bulgarian, Danish, Dutch, German, Hungarian, Italian, Polish, Romanian, Russian, Swedish, Arabic, Czech, Norwegian, Portuguese, Turkish and Greek.

description: The best action adventure game on your Android! And it's free!Exciting and fun physics based adventure game!Fly from vine to vine, but watch out for dangers lurking in the jungle. Earn bananas to get upgrades, specials and power ups.Features: - Beautiful cartoon & hand drawn like graphics - Fun physics based gameplay (swing a monkey along ropes to get forward) - Make your run through various landscapes (temple ruins, waterfalls and jungles) - Collect fruits like bananas and chilis to gain more upgrades - Unlock special powers such as a jetpack, chili speed boost and eagle ride - Cloth your monkey differently (ninja costume, gas mask) - Different kinds of ropes (vines, snakes, burning ropes etc.)Download now and experience the joy of flying along the vines through various environments!If you have any issues with the game, please contact our support at support@fingersoft.netCheck out the Benji Bananas website at http://www.benjibananas.com/Benji Bananas is developed by TribeFlame Ltd. and published by Fingersoft Ltd.
descriptionHTML:
The best action adventure game on your Android! And it's free!

Exciting and fun physics based adventure game!

Fly from vine to vine, but watch out for dangers lurking in the jungle. Earn bananas to get upgrades, specials and power ups.

Features:
- Beautiful cartoon & hand drawn like graphics
- Fun physics based gameplay (swing a monkey along ropes to get forward)
- Make your run through various landscapes (temple ruins, waterfalls and jungles)
- Collect fruits like bananas and chilis to gain more upgrades
- Unlock special powers such as a jetpack, chili speed boost and eagle ride
- Cloth your monkey differently (ninja costume, gas mask)
- Different kinds of ropes (vines, snakes, burning ropes etc.)

Download now and experience the joy of flying along the vines through various environments!

If you have any issues with the game, please contact our support at support@fingersoft.net

Check out the Benji Bananas website at http://www.benjibananas.com/

Benji Bananas is developed by TribeFlame Ltd. and published by Fingersoft Ltd.
summary: The best action adventure game on your Android! And it's free!
title: Benji Bananas
