description: It is really a cool add-on that comes with 17 different pieces of fashionable furniture suited for any of your house rooms. Each furniture item has its specific functional use. Such as the radio is used to play your favorite music, and the refrigerator is meant for the food storage. However, the main and most important thing is that the furniture will create a unique house design that will definitely amaze your friends. How does it work?Watch the video guide! Put down the DL-Box and then take any furniture bits to assemble the furniture (just press on the box for quite a long time). The DL-Box substitutes the shulker, meaning you need a shulker egg for creation (or just type/ summon shulker)The add-on is loaded with: - New and remodeled furniture; - Stools, chairs, and occasional tables, whose dimensions can be changed using the command Golden Pickaxe; - Statues were renamed into Spooky Statues ‚Äìthey will defend you from evil mobs if you upgrade them with the Golden Pickaxe command; - Computers can keep emeralds and provide you with a debit card (the shulker shell). This is a non-official application. And this application has nothing to do with the Mojang AB Company. The name, brand, and a trademark of minecraft exclusively belong to the Mojang AB and we highly respect their property. All rights are reserved according to the http://account.mojang.com/documents/brand_guidelines Internet portal.
descriptionHTML:
It is really a cool add-on that comes with 17 different pieces of fashionable furniture suited for any of your house rooms. Each furniture item has its specific functional use. Such as the radio is used to play your favorite music, and the refrigerator is meant for the food storage. However, the main and most important thing is that the furniture will create a unique house design that will definitely amaze your friends.

How does it work?

Watch the video guide! Put down the DL-Box and then take any furniture bits to assemble the furniture (just press on the box for quite a long time). The DL-Box substitutes the shulker, meaning you need a shulker egg for creation (or just type/ summon shulker)

The add-on is loaded with:
- New and remodeled furniture;
- Stools, chairs, and occasional tables, whose dimensions can be changed using the command Golden Pickaxe;
- Statues were renamed into Spooky Statues –they will defend you from evil mobs if you upgrade them with the Golden Pickaxe command;
- Computers can keep emeralds and provide you with a debit card (the shulker shell).

This is a non-official application. And this application has nothing to do with the Mojang AB Company.
The name, brand, and a trademark of minecraft exclusively belong to the Mojang AB and we highly respect their property. All rights are reserved according to the http://account.mojang.com/documents/brand_guidelines Internet portal.
summary: Furniture in Minecraft will turn your home into a picture of comfort and style
title: The Furniture MCPE Mod

comments: Glu games never fail to dissapoint, and Dino Hunter Deadly Shores is no exception. The graphics are satisfying, the weapons are creative and the gameplay is entertaining. I am empathetic, and realize that You need ads to generate income, but the amount of afs in this game is rudiculous Nonetheless, I have had a great experience playing this game, and It never fails to keep me entertained and enthralled. Keep it up!

It is a time killer with some fun for a bit. The graphics are good. My main point of contention is their shady sales practice where they have two GLU credit packs for the same price (say $49.99) one is for 1300 credits and the other for 2500. There is really no difference in the world, except one says credit pack and the other says value pack. It isn't until you get to the payment screen that if you aren't observant that you notice that the "value pack" of 2500 credits for $49.99 is a monthly subscription. They need to clearly state this on the listing so people are well aware before they hit the purchase button. But they won't because they are shady as fu*k

Hi, the game is pretty nice. I have a problem when I select to hunt with a bow for daily missions. Is there a trick to solve this? The problem look like a half of a screen in vertical, has very bad sync with the other half, and is quite impossible to see the monsters; only after I select to zoom, appear for a moment some clear image, but that is not for long...is just impossible to such mission....please fix this.

I've been playing this game since 2016. I know I have had a few different carriers and phones but my stats always begin over. I know you have the means to rollover data therefore for this reason alone l say that you are greedy little men and women.  The game is one of my favorites so there it is. I've spent thousands on this game alone every penny worth it.

I really liked the overall feel of the game, and it isn't too long in loading either. The only thing I don't like is how fast the energy levels wear out. Other than that though it's good, because if you don't have enough money to upgrade to a larger mission, you can do smaller missions to collect more money. :) I would definitely recommend this to gamers.

Great game. Lots of fun to pass the time. I would have given it 5/5 except for the fact that they heavily favor in app purchases and it's about 10 times more difficult to advance without spending real money. But graphics, gameplay, and the concept of the game I give a 10/10!
description: Hunt or be hunted! Embark on the dinosaur hunting expedition of a lifetime to kill the ultimate game in Dino Hunter: Deadly Shores.HUNT DINOSAURSJourney to a hidden, untouched Jurassic island and kill the most ferocious animals in history.  Encounter Jurassic beasts long thought extinct, from the docile stegosaurus to the terrifying T. rex.VISIT EXOTIC Jurassic LOCATIONSKill dinosaurs in lush and dangerous Jurassic environments like the shipwreck-strewn coast, overgrown jungle and dinosaur boneyard!EQUIP POWERFUL WEAPONSLoad up on firepower with destructive weapons like the rocket launcher and shuriken crossbow.  You‚Äôll need a powerful arsenal and an expert shooter strategy to kill these dinosaurs!MASTER A UNIQUE SHOOTER CHALLENGE SERIESProgress through varied shooter series to win rifles, shotguns and assault rifles. Make your kills and complete them all for even greater rewards!EXPERIENCE AMAZING GRAPHICSDynamic shadows, hi-res textures and realistic Jurassic models all combine to make this one of the most beautiful dinosaur shooter games on your mobile device!High-end, immersive tablet gameplay!‚ÄúIt‚Äôs as if Glu Mobile was listening in on my mind as I imagined how good Deer Hunter 2014 would be with dinosaurs.‚Äù ‚Äì Kotaku ‚Äú‚Ä¶ I am totally, absolutely, 100% completely behind blasting dinosaurs with guns until they explode, and happily that's exactly what Dino Hunter: Deadly Shores will let you do.‚Äù ‚Äì AppSpy ‚ÄúDino Hunter: Deadly Shores dishes up tons of behemoth-shooting action. It‚Äôs an easy game to enjoy.‚Äù ‚Äì Gamezebo ‚ÄúDino Hunter: Deadly Shores is a solid shooter. The dinosaurs in the game are very well detailed and the game allows you to jump right in‚Ä¶‚Äù ‚Äì ModojoPLEASE NOTE:- This game is free to play, but you can choose to pay real money for some extra items, which will charge your Google account. You can disable in-app purchasing by adjusting your device settings.-This game is not intended for children.- Please buy carefully.- Advertising appears in this game.- This game may permit users to interact with one another (e.g., chat rooms, player to player chat, messaging) depending on the availability of these features. Linking to social networking sites are not intended for persons in violation of the applicable rules of such social networking sites.- A network connection is required to play.- For information about how Glu collects and uses your data, please read our privacy policy at: www.Glu.com/privacy- If you have a problem with this game, please use the game‚Äôs ‚ÄúHelp‚Äù feature.  FOLLOW US atTwitter @glumobilefacebook.com/glumobile
descriptionHTML:
Hunt or be hunted! Embark on the dinosaur hunting expedition of a lifetime to kill the ultimate game in Dino Hunter: Deadly Shores.

HUNT DINOSAURS
Journey to a hidden, untouched Jurassic island and kill the most ferocious animals in history. Encounter Jurassic beasts long thought extinct, from the docile stegosaurus to the terrifying T. rex.

VISIT EXOTIC Jurassic LOCATIONS
Kill dinosaurs in lush and dangerous Jurassic environments like the shipwreck-strewn coast, overgrown jungle and dinosaur boneyard!

EQUIP POWERFUL WEAPONS
Load up on firepower with destructive weapons like the rocket launcher and shuriken crossbow. You’ll need a powerful arsenal and an expert shooter strategy to kill these dinosaurs!

MASTER A UNIQUE SHOOTER CHALLENGE SERIES
Progress through varied shooter series to win rifles, shotguns and assault rifles. Make your kills and complete them all for even greater rewards!

EXPERIENCE AMAZING GRAPHICS
Dynamic shadows, hi-res textures and realistic Jurassic models all combine to make this one of the most beautiful dinosaur shooter games on your mobile device!

High-end, immersive tablet gameplay!

“It’s as if Glu Mobile was listening in on my mind as I imagined how good Deer Hunter 2014 would be with dinosaurs.” – Kotaku

“… I am totally, absolutely, 100% completely behind blasting dinosaurs with guns until they explode, and happily that's exactly what Dino Hunter: Deadly Shores will let you do.” – AppSpy

“Dino Hunter: Deadly Shores dishes up tons of behemoth-shooting action. It’s an easy game to enjoy.” – Gamezebo

“Dino Hunter: Deadly Shores is a solid shooter. The dinosaurs in the game are very well detailed and the game allows you to jump right in…” – Modojo

PLEASE NOTE:
- This game is free to play, but you can choose to pay real money for some extra items, which will charge your Google account. You can disable in-app purchasing by adjusting your device settings.
-This game is not intended for children.
- Please buy carefully.
- Advertising appears in this game.
- This game may permit users to interact with one another (e.g., chat rooms, player to player chat, messaging) depending on the availability of these features. Linking to social networking sites are not intended for persons in violation of the applicable rules of such social networking sites.
- A network connection is required to play.
- For information about how Glu collects and uses your data, please read our privacy policy at: www.Glu.com/privacy
- If you have a problem with this game, please use the game’s “Help” feature.

FOLLOW US at
Twitter @glumobile
facebook.com/glumobile

descriptionHTML:
The sequel to the legendary game that captured the hearts and minds of over 100 million players is here!

Warning: Paradise Island 2 is highly addictive even if you’ve never played this kind of game before.

"Paradise Island 2" is a game for everyone who loves the sun, the sea, and the sand!

Tear yourself away from work and build your own resort on a sunny island and become the ultimate hotel mogul!

Don’t you think it’s time to start your own business? Wealthy tourists are already flocking to your sunny shores! Entertain them in casinos and entertainment centers, build hotels, restaurants and stores, and provide plenty of amusements! Build your own empire of entertainment! Turn your island into the best resort empire and learn to manage your own business.


Key features:

✔ Build over 300 buildings drawn in a unique style.

✔ Improve and develop your island, invite and entertain guests, and earn huge profits!

✔ Help and feed animals in danger, build your city in tune with nature.

✔ Save an adorable leopard cub and get a loyal pet in return.

✔ Assemble a collection of unique animals and natural phenomena.

✔ Find all the hidden ancient treasures.

✔ Play fascinating mini-games (arcades, platformers, puzzles, pairs, PvP, PvE and more) with daily rankings of the best players and their achievements.

✔ Complete ambitious projects: find and rebuild ancient pyramids, abandoned farms, and world wonders!

✔ Take part in competitions against friends and other city managers for the best places in the game rankings.

✔ Win in fun PvP fights called Beach Battles.

✔ Play in offline mode. Enjoy it on a plane, on the subway, or on the road!

✔ Play with your friends: visit friends’ islands to find hidden objects and receive gifts!

✔ Unique events with special game mechanics and lots of amazing quests.


Build your own tourist city with luxury hotels, receive guests and complete exciting tasks. Paradise is within reach! Take the reins of power and show the world that you can be a successful magnate!

The long-awaited sequel to one of the best economic city-builder simulation games!


"Paradise Island 2" Facebook community: https://www.facebook.com/ParadiseIsland2/

comments: If anybody reads this they should buy this game because it is one the most fun angry Bird games I have ever played. Me and my friend try to get to the boss levels. The levels are so fun and challenging. The world are great to. And there is a lot of worlds like "fry me to the moon" and "utopia". The only problem is there are a whole lot of ads. Most people complain about the ads. If you remove the ads I'm sure they'll give you a better rating. But other than that this game is very fun. I think this is one of the games that made the company a success.

Great game. Keeps me busy when I need to take my mind off of things. Really makes you use " problem solving skills. As you try each time to get it with less birds. Really like this game. No ads like others said. It could be that I did not use wi  fi.

Controls can be sluggish when aiming, causing misses. Great graphics, but you need to study gravitational forces, lol.  MEH, same old, same old, different scenery. Maybe you developers ought to think about doing an Angry Birds with a little bit of an adventure version and a bit of a story . . . would break up the monotonous game play.

Fun game but really? Phone is muted, sound off in game, everything should be quiet but adds play at full volume.  Obviously you don't care about what I want or need.  Will play no more angry bird games, ever.  Sending complaint to advitisor...

It's a horrible game . The moment I start playing the advertisements raise up. Actually I am a big fan of this game and I like the producers theme and I trust their games a lot that they will go on well.  But this game proved that I was wrong.  I am not able to play the level well because of ads. I truly say I am a big fan of this game. But from now I hate this game. I wish they remove the ads it's may request

Hmm...   Why doesn't turn off Wi-fi?  Pig puffer makes me laugh.  My only complaint is that helmet pig's helmet is... unbreakable? How on earth?  Then again, we're not actually ON earth in this game...  Seriously,  though.  FIX THAT.
description: The #1 mobile game of all time blasts off into space!Play over 300 interstellar levels across 10 planets ‚Äì including our very own Solar System!Whether it‚Äôs the icy orbs of Cold Cuts, the volcanic explosiveness of Red Planet, Utopia ‚Äì a planet made entirely of junk food, or even our own Solar System, each episode offers intergalactic fun at every turn! And the low-gravity environment of space results in spectacular gameplay ranging from slow-motion puzzles to lightspeed destruction. With brand new birds, special abilities, and a whole galaxy to explore, the sky is no longer the limit!-----‚ÄúIntergalactic phenomenon worth every penny‚Äù ‚Äì AppCraver‚ÄúTakes the fundamental physics-based flinging of the original and turns it on its head... It's satisfying, yet completely familiar, and is heaps of pig-smashing fun.‚Äù ‚Äì Gamespot‚ÄúAnyone burnt out on vanilla bird flinging will enjoy the game's out-of-this-world adventure.‚Äù -- IGN------ Over 300 interstellar levels!- New playable characters!- Unique special abilities for each bird!- Zero-gravity space adventures!- Trick shots using planets‚Äô gravity!- Hidden bonus levels!- Beautifully detailed backgrounds!- Daily Missions!-----Join the global phenomenon as it goes galactic!Become a fan of Angry Birds on Facebook:http://facebook.angrybirds.comFollow us on Twitter:http://twitter.angrybirds.comTerms of Use: http://www.rovio.com/eulaPrivacy Policy: http://www.rovio.com/privacyThis application may require internet connectivity and subsequent data transfer charges may apply.Important Message for ParentsThis game may include:- Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13.- Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse any web page.- Advertising of Rovio products and also products from select partners.- The option to make in-app purchases. The bill payer should always be consulted beforehand.
descriptionHTML:
The #1 mobile game of all time blasts off into space!

Play over 300 interstellar levels across 10 planets – including our very own Solar System!

Whether it’s the icy orbs of Cold Cuts, the volcanic explosiveness of Red Planet, Utopia – a planet made entirely of junk food, or even our own Solar System, each episode offers intergalactic fun at every turn! And the low-gravity environment of space results in spectacular gameplay ranging from slow-motion puzzles to lightspeed destruction. With brand new birds, special abilities, and a whole galaxy to explore, the sky is no longer the limit!

-----

“Intergalactic phenomenon worth every penny” – AppCraver

“Takes the fundamental physics-based flinging of the original and turns it on its head... It's satisfying, yet completely familiar, and is heaps of pig-smashing fun.” – Gamespot

“Anyone burnt out on vanilla bird flinging will enjoy the game's out-of-this-world adventure.” -- IGN

-----

- Over 300 interstellar levels!
- New playable characters!
- Unique special abilities for each bird!
- Zero-gravity space adventures!
- Trick shots using planets’ gravity!
- Hidden bonus levels!
- Beautifully detailed backgrounds!
- Daily Missions!

-----

Join the global phenomenon as it goes galactic!

Become a fan of Angry Birds on Facebook:
http://facebook.angrybirds.com

Follow us on Twitter:
http://twitter.angrybirds.com

Terms of Use: http://www.rovio.com/eula
Privacy Policy: http://www.rovio.com/privacy

This application may require internet connectivity and subsequent data transfer charges may apply.


Important Message for Parents

This game may include:
- Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13.
- Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse any web page.
- Advertising of Rovio products and also products from select partners.
- The option to make in-app purchases. The bill payer should always be consulted beforehand.

title: Angry Birds Space HD

comments: Here is a tip on how the game can be easy to play, step 1, Focus on the customer cause if you do that then it's not so bad, step 2, Upgrade your skates. The skates are the main thing you need to upgrade cause the skates give you more speed, step 3, The TV's. The TV increases distraction to the customers. The BIGGER the TV is, the BETTER it will be for you to play, step 4, seats. The seats are very important cause once maxed out, the more money you get, step 5, tapping speed. When tapping you don't need to wait, all you need to do is tap one spot, then the other so quickly it's like your not even playing a game. Just follow these steps and  you'll be making money in minutes.

I really love this game ever since..I used to play this on Y8 and get pass through all the days...on this version though it' s too short it is really fun and easy to play..i have passed all the days successfully. Please let Penny be lost again so you can have more levels. Great game..my all time favorite Penguin Diner. Two Thumbs Up!!!

LOVE IT! At first I was debating whether or not to download this game because of the reviews stating this game has "too many ads". After trying this game, though, I think the ad amount is just fine. An ad every 3 minutes? That's not a big deal. Love this app, if you're bored give it a try!

Great game, but too many ads This is a great game, my favorite diner game, actually, but there are wayy too many ads. There's an ad every time I finish a day. And I don't want to buy the game without ads, because I'm just gonna finish the game anyway and waste  money. I understand some ads, but one after every day is just way too many. Other than that, this game is amazing. And is it just me, or is everyone stuck on Day 26?

Its very laggy and after EACH level there is a half minute ad you cant skip... The laggyness is the same on all my phones (3+ipad) so its not the phone. I love the game but the laggyness and the ads are killing me. I cant play this game. Switch to 5 second ads or so you can skip and fix the lag so I can play! Please!
Game is great but the ads... Are painful. That's it. 30 seconds after each day and with no possibility of skipping them?! It's ridiculous. I'll put 5 stars if you fix this bogus ad problem

descriptionHTML:
Tom, a Genius School graduate, is looking for his dream job. What’ll it be? Astronaut? Firefighter? Pilot? Guess again… he’s decided to become a superstar hairdresser! Only problem is, his bosses don’t let him touch actual hair… unless it’s on the floor. Poor Tom is only allowed to stick to menial tasks like scrubbing floors and answering phones. Play this mischievous hairdressing game to help Tom cut his way from “barberchop” around the corner to world-class designer hair salons… all while avoiding his bosses’ watchful eye.

Cheating Tom graduated Genius School. Now he’s got to enter the real world and get a job. So his days of sneaking around are probably over, right? WRONG. As they say, “once a cheater, always a cheater.” Play this game to help Tom become an amazing hairstylist without getting caught by his annoying bosses who are determined to keep him sweeping the floors day after day.

Features:
> Help Tom sneak his way from hair salon to hair salon!
> Hurry up and get playing! You’ve got 25 different hairstyles to master as you play this crazy game!
> Make sure he cuts and styles customers’ hair as quickly as possible before his boss notices.
> Tons of challenging levels & supercool game play modes for ultra sneakiness.
> Score power-ups and collect coins to become sneakier than ever.
> WARNING: You may encounter some extremely peculiar customers…!
> Chop-chop! Cut that hair as fast as you can, and make sure the customers are satisfied, OR ELSE!
> Choose your game avatar - Tom or Taffy – and get cutting!
> Dress Tom and Taffy up in crazy costumes.


ABOUT US
Crazy Labs is a casual games brand, under which TabTale develops and publishes fun and addictive games. Crazy Labs partners with independent development studios across the globe to create engaging mobile content for audiences of all ages.

There are so many nice and beautiful spa items, a lot of colorful Makeups, and you could makeover and dressup the girl who looks like not too beautiful girl. After you spa, makeup, dressup her, you will find how beautiful and gorgeous she is! She must be a delicate prom queen! Moreover, if you like, you could paint her with the nice eyeshadow, lipstick and blusher. In the luxuriant room, dress up her with so many nice prom queen dresses, you will find one dress which you like best, after spa, makeup, and dressup, she will be a wonderful girl and go to her Prom Dancing Party. That is really an unforgettable journey! In the Facial Spa room, you could make the girl more relaxing and clean her face, this is really a Facial SPA experience like a realistic life. After that, she will come to a beautiful makeup room, choose your like or more suitable her style and makeover her. Really? That's more fun! You can do anything as your like and manually. descriptionHTML:
What's the point of life if there are no selfies to show it off? ;-) You're on your way to becoming a famous social media fashion model and Selfie Queen! Keep your followers coming by posting supercool selfies!

Have you been dreaming of becoming a famous social media star? Now's your chance! When you're a social media model, you need to be ready for a selfie at a moment's notice. Show off your fashionista style - dress up in the hottest outfits, and take selfies every step of the way!

Features:
> Dress up in the coolest, selfie-worthy outfits! Don't forget to accessorize!
> What fashion vibe are you feeling today - Urban? Party? Romantic? Choose your style!
> Win fun selfie contests! Show 'em who the true Selfie Queen is!
> Your awesome apartment is the best background you could wish for for your ultra chic modeling selfies!
> Strike a pose! It's time for your fashion modeling photo shoot. Choose the filter that's just right for your photos. Add a sticker too!
> Experiment with a variety of stunning looks - your very own personal stylist will help you!
> Be the envy of the social media world, with a killer makeover that will make your selfies pop!
> Try a fun new hairstyle - your followers will love it!
> Get exciting new daily gifts by posting your #OOTD’s (outfit of the day) every day!

ABOUT Coco Play
Coco Play Limited is China-based developer of creative and unique apps for kids. Founded in 2013, Coco Play provides rich 3D simulation-based games for the whole family. Coco Play is a subsidiary of TabTale, a leading, global creator of innovative games, interactive books and educational apps.

descriptionHTML:
Get ready for a big water splash this season! Forget all the roller coaster rides and funland fantasy adventure games and join the ultimate waterslide amusement rush in the best waterslide 3D simulator game.

Enjoy all the thrills & entertainment of 3D aqua adventure park in this water fun game on your mobile without leaving the comfort of your home. So get ready for some extreme water-slide races in the world’s craziest water park simulator!

Features of Water Slide Downhill Rush:
⬩ Amazing environments to explore!
⬩ High quality, immersive visuals
⬩ Enjoy the extreme slider with different camera views
⬩ 5 challenging 3D slides game levels to enjoy!
⬩ Extreme water park thrills with 3D water slider
⬩ Less in size so easy to download!
⬩ Exhilarating physics guaranteed to give you an adrenaline rush!
⬩ Fastest water racing game action
⬩ Coolest & tallest water slide simulator

Survive as long as you can as you perform crazy stunts and blast through everything in your path! Whizz and bounce through rollercoaster-style corkscrews! You’ll be brave in incredible water parks and dominate some seriously insane tracks in this physics-based game. This is more than just fun in the sun…Have you got the skills to make it to the finish line in this epic thrill-filled ride? Download Water Slide Downhill Rush now and experience a extreme rush!

All you need to have is an android device to whizz through at lightning speeds in this racing waterslide game. Water Slide Downhill Rush is the next top trending 3D game of 2017 with epic madness in a water slide downhill rush adventure 3D.
recentChanges: Are you ready? Go on the brand new diving board and draw figures to make the coolest moves!
Walk to the diving board in the water park to enter this exciting mini game and have so much fun!

title: Water Slide Downhill Rush
